name: Idle Pocket Planet
description: Grow your little planets into technological fortresses and discover new (and kind of weird) galaxies! Set out on a cosmic voyage into the vast expanse and discover new planets to claim!

name: Witch Arcana
description:
Welcome to the strange and beautiful world of Dwimmer...

... where universities of magic compete with each other to seal the monster-filled portals that open randomly throughout the land. At one such school arrives aspiring magician Gwendoline Harlowe, who quickly discovers there is much more to the Wakehollow Academy of Arcana than meets the eye…

Grow your academy, battle vile monsters and rival schools, and join clubs to meet fellow magicians from around the world!

name: Mirror 2: Project Z
description: We intend to create a 3D anime-style open-world simulation and management game, which has rich and relatively independent gameplay modules that can adapt to players with different tastes.

name: The True Love Rings
description: "The True Love Rings" is a scene interactive decryption game. The overall atmosphere is casual and relaxed. Players follow the prompts in the scene to gradually solve the puzzles and help solve the problems encountered in life.

name: Deceptus
description: Arena PVP Multiplayer with up to 8 Players, pure mayhem, kill and collect famous death coins to unlock and equip up your characters with famous accessories and power-ups on 9 levels and counting.

name: Theseus Protocol
description: Theseus Protocol is a SCI-FI DBG strategy game. In this highly intelligent time, you are forced to adapt to the laws of survival and become stronger in battles. Seeking for the truth, you must travel across variety of novel scenes to reveal the full story by collecting fragments of information.

name: Ensora
description: Having lost contact with the Earth, the colonists split into groups in a desperate struggle for the remnants of food and resources. Can you fight back against bands of thugs? Will you uncover the secrets of the powerful Corporation? Do you have a chance to return home?

name: Blinnk and the Vacuum of Space
description: Welcome to deep space station Norpopolis – where a batch of escaped critters are causing chaos! Grab your Vacuumizer 5000 and go undercover with BLINNK the robot to catch them all. An autism-friendly VR adventure!

name: Showrunner
description: Create and run your own TV show! An isometric management game where you craft scripts, populate your world with characters and cast actors to play them. Hire and manage staff, develop your studio and gain a dedicated following.

name: World Championship Boxing Manager 2
description:
The boxing world is at your fingertips in this deeply detailed and outrageously entertaining sports management simulation. Enlist competitive fighters, recruit top-notch staff, and ride the hype train all the way to endorsement city! Watch your fighter rise to the top, or get KO’d trying.

An official sequel to 1991’s highly-applauded World Championship Boxing Manager, this iteration captures the essence of the original and expands upon it. Offering updated visuals, deeper gameplay, and new characters that extend the World Championship Boxing Manager franchise, WCBM2 provides fun for grizzled veterans and lightweight fans. Go toe to toe with fantasy characters, or take the main stage with historical boxing legends including Rocky Marciano, Sugar Ray Robinson, and more!

name: Dear Monster
description: Allen thought he had his life all figured out. He just graduated university and was headed off to med school. Then a strange letter arrives from a grandfather he never new. He's pulled onto a new path toward a strange mansion filled with even stranger and alluring creatures.

name: Cairo Stark: Crocs Hunter
description: Cairo Stark: Crocs Hunter is a game full of incredible adventures with bright three-dimensional characters and a mysterious colorful world. Stop the invasion of Crocosaurus!

name: Farlanders
description: Companies are colonizing Mars and settlers are lining up to go. Play as one colonies’ architect to create the best settlement in the galaxy. Wisely use limited terraforming tools to build to your settlers’ needs or they might end up packing up and going to a rival base instead!

name: Alien Egg: Ascent
description:
Jump your way into outer space to help a lost alien egg find its way back to its homeworld!

Take on the role of a mysterious egg awakening in an abandoned laboratory, leaping through challenging terrain and over a diverse array of obstacles in order to find a portal back home. Traverse upward through several different environments, including the abandoned lab itself and exotic alien landscapes, but beware: one wrong move could spell a mighty fall!

Gather your wit and determination, and be ready to get back up again when you're knocked down - Ascend!

name: Re:Call
description: In Re:Call memories are malleable and changing them will modify the present. Tackle mind-bending puzzles that rely on altering your own recollections to shape the future.

name: Abyss: Konmei no Toki
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic The Fighters Blitz Hyper Edition
description: Sonic The Fighters Blitz Hyper Edition (STFBHE) is the continuation of Sonic the Fighters Blitz (STFB), a 2D re-imagining of the arcade game Sonic The Fighters created by Restless Dipstick. STFBHE aims to rebalance and expand upon the original STFB.

name: Lost Chakras
description: A physics-based puzzle game made for all ages.

name: Hailot
description: Sin descripción

name: The Smoking Dog
description: set of 5 levels for doom2

name: Seasonal Affectiveness Disorder
description: As I have Seasonal Affectiveness Disorder I decided to make a map to emulate the feeling - this was on a day freezing rain kept my homebound and covered the city in ice.

name: NetGame Adventure
description:
NetGame Adventure is a short puzzle-horror adventure game.

Explore the 'Haunted Journey' server of a forgotten browser game.

name: Unholy Angel
description: Charming girls that want to test your brain Relax, clear your mind and enjoy

name: Digital Exorcist
description:
While everyone is celebrating the coming of the new year 1999, retired Digital Exorcist Sawyer and his computerized partner Tomodachi run into a grisly scene that will make this jaded investigator remember all the old techniques he learned at the agency.

Travel into a world where cyberdemons live all around us in this Adventure Game/Visual Novel inspired by Snatcher and The Silver Case. Do you have what it takes to become a Digital Exorcist?

name: Switch Sides
description: A infinite rolling adventure. Switch sides quickly to stop the ball rolling off the edge!

name: Adventure's Pixel World
description: Face goblins, trolls, bats, giant golems, spiders, angry chickens, dangerous traps and much more to complete levels that get more and more challenging. Collect as many candies as you can to unlock stronger characters. Attention: Only legends will succeed!

name: 100 Keys to Your Heart
description: Figure out a way to get the correct key for every door in this sweet Puzzle Platformer game.

name: Remember U
description: Even if it is a short moment, please remember me!

name: White Water
description: Defeat the enemy as quickly as possible

name: Old World: The Sacred and The Profane
description: Old World - The Sacred and The Profane adds a touch of religious fervor to your play with a wealth of new content that explores how religion impacted the fortunes of ancient empires. Experience over 350 new events, recruit new historical characters, and deal with the demands of the clergy as you try and appease the various faiths that exist within the Old World.

name: Fear of The Undead: Rise of Evil
description: Fear of The Undead: Rise of Evil features a PvE battle with wave progression, the further the player goes, the harder it gets. It offers four characters with distinct stories and abilities, along with a catalog of maps and weapons.

name: Zombies in Metropolis
description: This is not a drill. Everything is quite serious... Zombies have attacked the city from all sides...

name: Hentai SportsGirl
description: Hentai SportsGirl is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of sports girl and 24 unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Lost Cartridge: Cold Read
description: Lost Cartridge: Cold Read is the first in a series of horror anthology games by Pure Ice Blue, creator of Lily's Well and I Cannot Drown. Explore the library, hide from those who want Mitch's life to end, and solve puzzles in order to possibly find a way to escape.

name: For Your Tranquility
description: It's a mystery game that reveals the truth through an autopsy. Be a forensic doctor and find out why the dead died.

name: Slayer Legend
description: Sin descripción

name: O2Jam Online
description: From the iconic songs to customizing your game UI and new tracks available to play! O2 Jam is now available on Steam~!

name: Sharded World
description: Sharded World is a survival and mission game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements. Your main task is to collect all the pieces of the main character's soul. They are needed to defeat the main villain Lich. He destroyed our world. And now the fate of the world depends only on you.

name: Jumping Cat
description: "Jumping Cat" is a simple and straightforward platform jumping game. In order to revive the lost kingdom, our cat hero puts on his cape and overcomes many obstacles to collect Gold Coins and Paw Gems in dungeons full of traps!

name: The Burrito Quest
description: Someone stole your burrito. You have to find it. What are you waiting for?

name: Alcyon Infinity
description: Destroy hordes of ever-improving enemies and their Mothership. Alcyon Infinity is a fast shooter/bullet hell with dynamic movement and risk management. Up to 4 Co-Op players with Controllers.

name: Koatl el Defensor: Los Túneles Perdidos
description: Koatl the Defender, the Lost Tunnels is an action platform video game set in the Koatl the Defender universe, published by Codex Studio.

name: Word Crystal
description: A daily word guessing game with four linked words of five letters apiece.

name: Gem Worlds
description: Gem World is a roguelike-puzzle hybrid. Explore 100 levels in 10 unique worlds. Dodge boulders, collect gems, fight (or avoid) monsters. Unlock and upgrade more than 20 diverse skills across multiple runs. Exploit obstacles like mines, teleporters, and more. Turn-based and easy to play.

name: WW2 Rebuilder
description: In WWII Rebuilder you will make cities destroyed in the World War II come back to life. Use various heavy equipment to clear away debris and grab the bricks yourself to rebuild the walls of houses where people will live happily again.

name: Enupishi
description: It was a forbidden love, something that was against the rules of the game. One night, they decided to escape. How far could they go?

name: Boomer: Beyond Vanilla
description: Limit-removing Doom 2 WAD, focused on action, adventure and exploration, featuring a brand new MIDI soundtrack inspired by classic shooters' music.

name: Chocolate Cavern
description: A simple casual game. Control Licorice as you run through the chocolate caverns and avoiding the ghouls.

name: Roxy's Windows
description:
What's going on with Roxy?

Sift and sort your way through Roxy's cluttered desktop to uncover the truth! Roxy's Windows is an interactive story based game where you're free to take things at your own pace; learn more about Roxy and her friends through the files on her computer, organizing them as you please.

Created as a part of Stepford's Mobile Game Jam on Newgrounds, this game can be played entirely with touch controls on your mobile device (or left clicking with the mouse if you're on a computer) If you spend enough time exploring, you might even be rewarded for your efforts!

name: Word Trip
description: Word Trip is a light-action word-building game with three levels of difficulty, daily challenges, and a stress-free free play mode. Includes online leaderboards! The goal of the game is to get from the top word to the bottom one by making new four letter words.

name: Hidey Spot
description: There are presents hidden around the house. Who can wait for Christmas morning to open them all? Sneak around in the middle of the night and find the goodies before your family wakes up. And who knows—maybe it'll turn out there's something else for you to discover in the home you thought you knew so well…

name: The Botanist
description: Follow the Botanist as they travel through space, searching planets for the rare plants needed to solve the food shortage back home.

name: Grand Tour Legends
description: Grand Tour Legends is a crank-operated arcade racing game. Spin those pedals and battle 19 other riders across the tour. Experience the thrill of hurtling down the alpine countryside after an exhausting climb. Feel the ocean breeze as you sweep along the coastline. Work out the perfect strategy on each track, save energy to crank it when you need it!

name: Swap Machina
description: Help PD the robot supervisor defrag the mainframe before it's too late in this fast-paced puzzle game made in the Pulp game engine. Inspired by classic 90's block-based action puzzlers Panel de Pon and Tetris Attack, arcade game fans are sure to enjoy Swap Machina. You can compete with your friends' high scores online and locally using the leaderboard feature.

name: Carve Jr.
description: Hit the slopes like never before in the all new Carve Jr! This pint sized prequel packs a punch! Use the crank to perform pinpoint accurate, death defying, nonstop gnar action. Chain tricks together to fight your way up the leaderboard and prove your salt. Just don’t let those pesky trees, rocks, and narc skiers be a buzzkill!

name: Zombie Killer Mojito
description: Zombies have invaded every inch of the city! No one can escape, and nowhere to hide! You have no choice like other survivors. The only thing you can do is fight! Take your weapons and skills to make your way!

name: She Vomited Guns
description: A tragic gun shortage has brought many fortunes to the Synthetic Order, who are in the bleeding edge of arms development.

name: Pokémon PureBlue
description: This is a purist's enhancement of Pokémon Red/Blue/Green. The goal is to enhance the original games for excellent replayability without bringing in mechanics, moves, sprites, visuals, type matchups, or Pokémon that were introduced in later games. The 2.0 version is based on the disassembly and has hundreds of new optional features / fixes!

name: Madness/Endless
description: Darkness, despair, challenge... The world as we know it is run over by eldritch monstrosities. Survivors are few and far between, stuck between living in this new, grim world and scheming to overthrow others. You have been chosen to bear the greatest burden - the Herald’s Blade. Are you going to help your covenant or take over as the new overlord? Do you really have a choice?

name: Skew
description: A spin-off based on The Last Worker, Skew is a realtime 3D endless spinner starring the robot voiced by Jason Isaacs.

name: BoxLoop 2
description: The Time Looping Evil Boxes Are Back! Solve The Riddles and Help Save Our Hero Aous From The Time Looping Evil Boxes In This Roguelike Adventure.

name: Traveler
description: Building the game as Open World so you are able to go on in your speed - just to tell, only the ones who want to explore will find out the ultimate ending. Traveler contains 8 different themed worlds you are able to explore by your own.

name: Lawnmower Game: Ufo Chase
description: Lawnmower Game series is back. Now enemy UFO with several weapons are chasing Lawnmower guy. Cut enough grass and earn stars to unlock new levels and avoid UFO

name: The Jumping Salad: Turbo
description: Join Big S on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Monster Waifu
description: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: Cool Cats
description: Cool Cats is a platform game with elements of a puzzle, puzzle and labyrinths, where you have to act sequentially studying the map.

name: Playmaker
description: Paint, compose, build, record, and dance your way across six playful creative spaces for your Playdate.

name: Direct Drive
description: Direct Drive is a silent-movie-musical game about being an intern in the music industry in 1927.

name: Reel Steal
description: Reel Steal is a heist game where a mysterious figure hires thieves to reclaim loot & justice. As renegades, nab appropriated art from evil billionaires, hurriedly making calling cards to leave in their place. The hook? You're armed only with a fishing pole.

name: Recommendation Dog!!
description: Recommendation Dog!! is an adorable action-puzzle game about being a tiny dog with a very big job. You work at a temp agency, cranking through names in your rotary organizer to fulfill the wacky, lovely, and strange requests of the people who come through your door. Connect the right people with the places that need them, make fast-paced choices, and get the high score you deserve! Good boy. This is Recommendation Dog - and you are a very good boy indeed.

name: That's My Exploit Keeper!
description:
Exploit Keeper is a puzzle game, where you have to change the version of the game between the well developed one and the poorly developed one, to find the game bugs and exploit them to be able to continue the plot.
Badly programmed mechanics might be useful if used in the right place...

Between features that work poorly, repeating events and unindexed values, you will find every kind of nightmarish bug for beta testers!

name: Eikro: The Children of Darloum
description: Sin descripción

name: Little Eidolons
description:
An open-world rpg for Pico-8, where you can catch, train, and battle with over 100 varieties of monsters!

Gameplay is performed by navigating the overworld until you encounter either a wild Eidolon or an opposing trainer, which transitions the game to battle mode. Battle mode uses turn-based mechanics across a grid to allow you to fight - until all foes are defeated!

name: Super "Sonic Saves the World" World
description: Sin descripción

name: This Is How U Look Saying This Shit
description: This Is How U Look Saying This Shit is a mod for Friday Night Funkin' by phantasmuh that is based on the Boykisser meme.

name: New Leaf
description:
A man alone in the woods, all he wanted was peace, but he caught attention of a deadly creature.

Will you survive to see the reason behind all the chaos or be swallowed by the thing manipulating the entire forest?

name: Defy the Omphalos
description: A trio of glitched out Doom II maps from The Shareware Vats crew.

name: Tap to Build
description:
Welcome to Tap to Build, where the title says it all. Tap on the red button, spawn as many crates as you can, grab those materials and merge away!

Level up and unlock new areas of your map, which will also unlock new resources to collect and merge. The more resources you merge, the more advanced they become. It all culminates with a cute little building, complete with a worker to assist you in your quest to build an empire!

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game: Neo
description:
This hack, Pokémon TCG Neo, is a nearly complete overhaul of the base game in terms of battling. Why? Because all the generation 1 cards in this game have been replaced with generation 2 cards, everything has been balanced.

Featuring your favorites from Neo Genesis all the way to Skyridge, so many cards have been added and replaced that it’s completely changed the way this game is played. Pokémon, attacks, abilities, and even a few trainer cards were altered to create a new battling experience. If you’re looking for a TCG hack with all-new pokémon cards, look no further!

name: Brothel Simulator
description: In Brothel Simulator you must master the art of pleasing your clients by teaching your ladies their desired fetishes and keeping track of your regular customers. Your goal is to earn enough money to purchase all of the sex scenes in the gallery.

name: Kill Pill
description: All you need to do is kill the pills. Shoot your way to a new high score while collecting powerups to shake things up.

name: Drift Shape
description: Drift your way to success in this exciting game! Take control of your car and maneuver through a variety of shapes and obstacles. Show off your drifting dexterity as you earn points and race against your opponents. Put the pedal to the metal and take your drifting game to a whole new level!

name: The Mansion of Evil
description: The Mansion of Evil is a short funny game inspired by the old classic survival horror games.

name: Shiitake Showdown
description: The showdown between Snakes and Shrooms rages on in this high action first person arena shooter. Use your control over the elements and your experience with a gun to show up your friends and slay your enemy's.

name: Space Landing
description: indie adventure game topdown puzzle pixelart gameboy retrògame pixelart.

name: Quiz Thiz France: Bronze Edition
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: No One Survived
description: This is a multiplayer cooperative open world construction survival sandbox game, where you and your friends must find supplies and build shelters in this world. You have to keep an eye on your character's needs state at all times, a bad state is likely to lead to death.

name: Rising Front
description: A single-player, large scale WW1 game centered around trench warfare. It is a mix of FPS, Battle Sim and Strategy, making for epic battles with hundreds of units on the battlefield!

name: Furry Sex 2
description: Furry Sex 2 - is a classic 2D game in the memory genre which is about you find the same pictures and enjoy different images of furry beautiful ladies.

name: The Duck Song Game
description: The ever so loved The Duck Song has returned.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Season Pass 2
description:
Deepen your DRAGON BALL Z: KAKAROT experience by grabbing Season Pass 2 which includes 3 additional story arcs!

Season Pass 2 Bonus:
• Sea Monster Soup cooking item

name: Kao the Kangaroo: VIP
description:
Get the VIP look!
Future proof your fashion sense with this all new DLC pack for Kao The Kangaroo!
The VIP DLC pack contains three sci-fi themed costumes including - Space Knight, Robotic, and Future Punk. All three sets can be mixed and matched with previous cosmetics, adding a galaxy of options to your fashion choices!

name: Housle
description: Browser house price guessing game.

name: The Science of Staying Awake
description: You ever sit in class sleep deprived to all hell and wonder how long before you start going insane? You ever come home to find some some unidentified disheveled creature-guy-thing in your bed? College is tiring enough. You really don't need this. Unfortunately, this already got attached.

name: Cold Light
description: Four (4) map episode with a variety of medieval / wizard / runic themes in a classic style, made for vanilla Quake. Some levels are rather non-linear and large. Map source is included.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot + A New Power Awakens Set Season Pass 2
description: Be the hope of the universe. Deepen your Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot experience by grabbing Season Pass 2 which includes 3 additional story arcs!

name: Well, me neither
description: Originally designed for a community project, Well, me Neither is a short Doom 2 adventure through a possibly flesh-infested neighbourhood. It didn't quite fill the project's rubric, but I still feel it scrapes by just enough to deserve a second lease on life.

name: Monster Survivor
description: Monster Survivor is a free, fun survivor action game. Can you save the world by making the giraffe's neck longer?

name: Joy Match 3D
description: Get ready for a fun, interesting and challenging matching triple game.

name: Starfall Fantasy: Neverland
description:
Stellar Fantasy: Neverland, a fantasy open world MMORPG you have never seen.
As soon as the star falls, a space-time hole that once existed only in dream suddenly opens up... Farewell to the past, from now on, you can be whoever you want to be!
Immerse yourself in a fully-featured, massive 3D battlefield where you can see ancient scenes transformed into a futuristic city! Team up with strangers and friends to overcome various hardships and be reborn. Be a different you and create your glorious legacy!

name: MageCraft
description: MageCraft is a magical turn-based strategy adventure with an emphasis on building your collection of spells. Control a squad of mages, each with unique strengths and weaknesses, harnessing their powerful magical synergy in order to combat increasingly overwhelming foes.

name: Super Retro Platformer Collection
description: Our partner Leoful has announced a collection of four Nintendo Switch games we have developed or ported to Nintendo Switch. The Super Retro Platformer Collection will release in Asia on 13th of January 2023

name: Urban Flow: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Silent Love
description: This is a terrorist decryption adventure game that took place in 1913.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot + A New Power Awakens Set - Legendary Edition
description:
Play through iconic Dragon Ball Z battles on a scale unlike any other. Fight across vast battlefields with destructible environments and experience epic boss battles against the most iconic foes (Raditz, Frieza, Cell, etc.). Increase your power level through RPG mechanics and rise to the challenge!

Go beyond the history of Dragon Ball Z and experience 2 additional boss battles, with the New Power Awakens set! Master the power of the gods to challenge Lord Beerus and go even beyond to fight Golden Frieza with the power of Super Saiyan Blue!

name: Fury Fight: Gangsters of City
description: Violent crime lords have taken over the city. Defeat them and bring their underlings to justice in an excellent beat 'em up action game.

name: She Wants Me Dead: Deluxe Edition
description: Along the base game, you also get access to the Soundtrack DLC. Help Max escape from his fate and survive this purrfect punishment.

name: Swords & Bones: Deluxe Edition
description: The demon world invades humanity every 500 years. The Wolf Demon has been bullying the Kingdom of Vestus and it seems that there is no hope. But there’s one hero who can put an end to it - you - a nameless warrior with a sword in hand. What are you waiting for?

name: Worm Game
description: Play the game that came to Stadia before Stadia came to the world. “Worm Game” is a humble title we used to test many of Stadia’s features, starting well before our 2019 public launch, right through 2022. It won’t win Game of the Year, but the Stadia team spent a LOT of time playing it, and we thought we’d share it with you. Thanks for playing, and for everything.

name: Kame Paradise 3 Multiversex
description: Kame Paradise 3 Multiversex, made by Yamamoto Doujin, is the 3rd entry to Kame Paradise series, being a Dragon Ball Hentai Game released on January 13th, 2023. It is part of a series of games made by Yamamoto. It is a R+18 Adult Hentai game featuring Dragon Ball Characters from Dragon Ball: Original, Z, GT, and Super. This entry has character from Z, GT, and Super, as well as including Vomi/Android 21 from Dragon Ball FighterZ/Dragon Ball Super.

name: Train Sim World 3: Birmingham Standard Edition
description: Master the West Midlands with Train Sim World 3.

name: One Piece Odyssey: Deluxe Edition
description:
A brand new RPG set in the world of the popular anime, ONE PIECE! Play as members of the Straw Hat Crew in a fantastic adventure set in the ONE PIECE world!

The Deluxe Edition includes the Main Game, the Adventure Expansion Pack and the Deluxe Edition Bonus: Sniper King Outfit Set.

name: Broken Universe + Brawl Chess
description: Roco is just an everyday racoon. He's just given his sweetheart a pretty necklace... which caused the ENTIRE universe to explode! She's nowhere to be found and he's the only one who can save her. Are you ready to become a chess champion? Choose your hero and challenge other players in the game of kings.

name: Rings of Saturn: Deep Weeb
description: Transforms all crew portraits into beloved anime characters, adding a new level of personality and immersion to your space adventure.

name: NASCAR Rivals: 2022 Patriotic Pack
description: The NASCAR Rivals 2022 Patriotic Pack includes 30 alternate schemes from the 2022 NASCAR Cup Series season, mostly featuring the patriotic schemes used in the Memorial Day and Fourth of July race weekends at Charlotte Motor Speedway and Road America. Plus the addition of Noah Gragson’s no. 16 car for Kaulig Racing and legendary driver Bill Elliott. Players will also receive five new and unique Challenges, inspired by real-life events that took place during the 2022 NASCAR Cup Series season.

name: Johny Explorer
description: As Johny, you go deeper and deeper into the cave in search of treasures, watch out for the many traps and enemies waiting for your life

name: Grim Tales: The Time Traveler - Collector's Edition
description: Anna Gray is on her way to a family barbeque when disaster strikes! After nearly dying in a car crash, she discovers someone has murdered her niece and nephew and intends to destroy the entire Gray Family. Use your powers to travel back and time and right the killer's wrongs.

name: Unrestrained
description: Unrestrained is a great 3D horror game in which you have to survive in a mental hospital, playing as a reporter named Carl.

name: Ballotron Oceans
description:
Welcome to the next part of Ballotron!
You also shoot balls but everything happens underwater.
Make the Blue Ball hit the Green Ball to achieve the goal.
This time the level solutions will be even more fun!

name: It's Kooky + Cyber Protocol
description: Look for quirks in the new hidden object game - It's Kooky! You can also try your puzzle solving skills in Cyber Protocol. An arcade puzzle game set in a Cyberpunk world. Why pick when you can have them both.

name: Reky + Cyber Protocol
description: Feast your eyes on crystal clear visuals of reky. Interact with your environment and find a way to reach the finishing...square. You can also try your puzzle solving skills in Cyber Protocol. An arcade puzzle game set in a Cyberpunk world. Why pick when you can have them both.

name: DKO: Divine Knockout - Starter Edition
description:
Get started in the world's only 3rd-person platform fighter!

With the Starter Edition, you'll unlock:
The full game (all maps and modes)
4 Gods (Amaterasu, Sol, Hercules, and King Arthur)
1,200 Runes

name: Uncharted Ocean 2
description: Time to set sail! This is destined to be a journey full of opportunities. Open new trade routes, accumulate fortunes, and establish a maritime empire of your own! It is also a dangerous journey, you must defeat the evil pirates and other mystical dangers the ocean offers to a captain.

name: Confabulation
description: Your memory is fading. Things around your home keep changing; they are not what they appear to be. Find what is wrong, take pictures to restore your memory. Try to remember. Learn what you have forgotten, learn what has happened. It is not what it seems to be.

name: Hike Isle
description: Start the biggest Hike on the mysterious Isle! Discover the massive island piece by piece. Explore tens of unique locations and structures built on the Island by others. What kinds of mysterious things will you find?

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Pro Train Brocken Railway
description: Experience the historic meter-gauge Brockenbahn, covering 19km and 50 minutes of driving time, this scenic route offers a lot of fun. Since 1898, the Brocken has thus been accessible by rail and is today almost exclusively driven by steam locomotives.

name: Dragon Fury
description: 1v1 Fighting. Ninjas, Pirates, Robots, Aliens and more.

name: Powers of Hex
description: Powers of Hex is a non-linear experience of classic 2D platformers.Play as Hex on a quest to obtain all 6 unique, magic powers from Elfvis.

name: The Escape: Together
description: The Escape: Together is a 1-3 player Online CO-OP escape horror. The paranormal creature has taken over the house. You must use everything you find to survive and make your runaway.

name: Backdate Hero
description: Backdate Hero is an action Rogue lite game that integrates many elements. The game builds a completely elevated world with multiple civilizations as the core. The main character played by the player will become an important key in the world to save the world destroyed by meteorites.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Epic Egypt
description: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Egyptian themed tables with a unique aesthetic!

name: Pet Dragon Girl
description: Every true dragon keeps treasures and precious stones in her cave. For what? What else is she to do, between hibernation and protecting her treasure from brave adventurers? This story is about such an adventurer and how he tamed the dragon...

name: Kung Fu School
description: Welcome to the world of martial arts!

name: The Militant Mouse
description: The militant mouse is a hardcore 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you have to fight enemies.

name: Walk with the Living 2
description: Walk with the Living II is a strategy role-playing game with visual novel elements emphasizing character-driven storytelling and player choice. Its events follow Walk with the Living, and characters from the first game return.

name: The Jumping Salad
description: Join Big S on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Pillazon: MMO Drug Lord Tycoon
description: Pillazon is an MMO virtual business simulation game where you work as the CEO of a new company. Your mission is to create your own website and build the world's extensive drug empire!

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Bardock: Alone Against Fate
description: Experience the story of Goku's father, Bardock, who fought alone against his fate in this New Story. This is the story of one who stood alone against the scum of the universe. Bardock, warrior of Saiyan race, spent his days invading planets with his fellow soldiers. But an incident on Planet Kanassa would bring to his attention a calamity set to befall his home, Planet Vegeta.

name: Blazing Beaks + Badland: Game of the Year Edition
description: Stay sharp as danger lurks around every corner in these two colorful but twisted worlds.

name: Splatter: Zombiecalypse Now + The Hong Kong Massacre
description: Unleash a storm of bullets against your enemies in two action-packed, top-down shooters.

name: Cannibal Abduction
description: The family is hungry and he must provide, VHS slasher survival horror.

name: Terfenstein 3D
description: Terfenstein 3D is a short retro first-person shooter game about escaping a gender-fascist concentration camp. Unleash your pent-up fury upon the gender-critical tyrants with an arsenal of deadly weapons and tactics in cathartic bliss.

name: Spirits' Creek
description: Spirits’ Creek is a third-person horror adventure where, following an avalanche, you play as a father looking for his daughter. Battle supernatural creatures, tame the elements and solve the mystery surrounding the events in order to survive the night.

name: Within the Backrooms
description: You don't know how you got here, and you don't know how you'll leave. Wander the depths of the Backrooms in hopes of finding something more.

name: UnderDungeon
description: Embody Kimuto on the first day of his new job in this humor-packed dungeon crawler with surprising secrets to discover!

name: One Piece: Odyssey - Collector's Edition
description:
A storm, a shipwreck, a mysterious island. Expect the unexpected on your next adventure with the Straw Hats! A new RPG from the hugely popular manga and anime series One Piece, commemorating the 25th anniversary of the series!

The Collector's Edition includes:
- Game: One Piece Odyssey
- Luffy & Lim Figurine 230 x 210 x 210 mm
- Steelcase
- 3 Postcards
- Collector's Box
- Deluxe Pack - 2 Petite Jewelries + Travelling Outpit Sniper King + 100,000

name: Strange Aeons
description: Chat with an AI through the microphone. Escape a cyber-hell.

name: Bing in Wonderland
description: Bing in Wonderland is the sequel of Wanba Warriors. it's a 2D platformer no-exploration rogue-lite game with special ink art style.

name: Suffer 2
description: Suffer 2 is a tough-as-nails boomer shooter with a horror punk twist - become The Spirit of Anarchy and destroy the corporate police state with righteous ninja fury!

name: Aliens After Ava
description: You are Ava, a survivor out in the wild in the midst of an alien invasion. Fight back as you dodge, jump, roll, and use advanced technology to navigate your escape across terrain and extraterrestrial foes!

name: WooLoop
description: Wrap, weave, and wind your wool! Build works of art strand by strand, one loop at a time, in this tranquil game of craftsmanship. Draw inspiration from the large exhibition of levels available and unwind with the soothing soundtrack.

name: Aurora's Journey and the Pitiful Lackey
description: Join Aurora and the Lackey in this side-scrolling game with shooter mechanics, adventures, various mini-games and 3D graphics. In 1927, Aurora, a young astronomer, receives the journal of her father who disappeared four years earlier and embarks on a journey to find him.

name: Anti Frank's Wrath
description: Anti Frank is unleashing his wrath on the universe! Play by yourself or with a few friends locally to take down hoards of zombies and stop Anti Frank! Play as one of four unique characters and buy new upgrades and weapons as you rid the universe of zombies.

name: World of Turtle
description: Embark on a comical Sokoban-style puzzle adventure in World of Turtle! Solve 100 levels, collect delicious fruits, and reach the awaiting helicopter. Beware of cunning crocodiles and treacherous waters, as you navigate the levels. Can you outsmart the dangers and conquer this hilarious challenge?

name: Finnish Army Simulator
description: Experience the Finnish Army around the year 2011. We want you to feel nostalgic!

name: Drift Stage
description: Drift Stage is an upcoming arcade racer with a late 80's art style. It will feature a selection of cars inspired by the 70's, 80's and 90's. Like the name suggests, the drifting is a big part of the driving gameplay and is described by the developers as "easy to learn, hard to master".

name: Gemerald
description: Ongezellig themed mod for Half-Life.

name: Labyrinth Flowers
description: A 3D dungeon crawling RPG with animated H-scenes!

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Legendary Edition
description:
The Legendary Edition includes:
• Full game
• Season Pass (2 original episodes and a new story arc)
• Season Pass 2 (3 new story arcs)
• 2 Cooking Items that give your character temporary and permanent Stat boosts
• Tao Pai Pai Pillar

Relive the story of Goku and other Z Fighters in DRAGON BALL Z: KAKAROT! Beyond the epic battles, experience life in the DRAGON BALL Z world as you fight, fish, eat, and train with Goku, Gohan, Vegeta and others. Explore the new areas and adventures as you advance through the story and form powerful bonds with other heroes from the DRAGON BALL Z universe.

• Experience the story of DRAGON BALL Z from epic events to light-hearted side quests, including never-before-seen story moments that answer some burning questions of DRAGON BALL lore for the first time!

• Play through iconic DRAGON BALL Z battles on a scale unlike any other. Fight across vast battlefields with destructible environments and experience epic boss battles against the most iconic foes (Raditz, Frieza, Cell, etc.). Increase your power level through RPG mechanics and rise to the challenge!

• Don’t just fight as Z Fighters. Live like them! Fish, fly, eat, train, and battle your way through the DRAGON BALL Z sagas, making friends and building relationships with a massive cast of DRAGON BALL characters.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Symphony of Truth
description:
Version 6.3 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Herrscher of Truth
• New Story Chapter XXXIV: The Moon's Origin and Finality
• New Featured Event: Bustling Holiday Symphony ||∶
• ...and more!

name: Baldi's Farm!
description: Your friend wants to eat some corn, so he kicks you out to buy corn, but you don't have enough money on you, when Baldi finds you and he wants to invite you to his farm! It would be better if there was corn, and I believe you will definitely have fun on the farm!

name: Apotheosis X
description:
Apotheosis X pushes the boundaries of what's possible aesthetically with the marathon engine whilst retaining its low resolution 90's charm.

The campaign features engaging combat that scales with player skill and aggression, with a roster of new enemies and weaponry that compliments the original games' nuance and high skill ceiling.

name: Migrant Bird
description: Do you know about migratory birds? There are migratory birds: summer birds and winter birds. Summer migratory birds are birds that 'come north in spring and go south in autumn' and live in very warm conditions all year round, while winter migratory birds ...... are birds that fly north in spring to live far away and cold, only to return in winter. Although they may each spend half of their lives in the same place - they never get the chance to be together.

name: Sands of Salzaar: The Tournament
description: Experience the wonderful hero combos with 3 new gameplay mechanics around the competitive - tournament gameplay; - 5 new recruitable NPC's, each with their own unique mechanics and new visuals; - Dominate the arena with 25+ new gear designs and reap the rewards.

name: Wind Up
description: Wind Up is a multiplayer game focusing on social deduction, cooperation, and betrayal. In a complex haunted castle, the clockwork dolls outsmart imposters hiding among them. Who can escape the castle? Who will be banished? Who will be killed by imposters when night falls...

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S Heyawake
description:
A sophisticated puzzle offering
a delightful logical challenge.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series BombMachine Gunzohg
description:
Simple, exhilarating mecha action!
Destruction! Destroy! Let's destroy the Subete!

name: Arcade Archives: Senjyo
description:
An amazing 3D sensation that invites you
to an unknown battle!

name: Snake Game
description: Snake Game is back! Try this classic retro game and test all the options.

name: Lendas do Pebol: Mythic Football
description: A football game with characters you've never seen before! Get ready for a 1-on-1 Football match with mystical players! Choose your favorite Amazonian legend and fight to score a goal! Who will do better? The Boto? The Uirapuru? The Big Cobra? The Boitata? The power is in your hands!

name: Find the Whales
description: Find the Whales is a free-to-play educational game for all ages about ocean conservation. Find marine animals and do conservation quests to help protect them & their habitats!

name: Defcon: Xenos
description: Defend yourself against an onslaught of monstrous aliens in a variety of cities and landscapes of our beloved home: Earth. Combine equipment from your powerful arsenal of weapons, modules, and upgrades in order to face stronger and smarter aliens that provide an evergrowing challenge.

name: Highway Speeder
description: Endless highway destruction

name: Iaijutsu
description: In this retro action game, the player controls a mysterious ronin, navigating the rooftops and alleys of a rainy city as they are hunted by a team of elite assassins.

name: Revans
description: They have taken 67% of your country and are waiting for the day when the remained part will die. But you have been misunderstood again. You're just doing what any normal person would do in this case. It's called: + REVANS +

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train Brocken Railway
description: Experience the historic meter-gauge Brockenbahn, covering 19km and 50 minutes of driving time, this scenic route offers a lot of fun. Since 1898, the Brocken has thus been accessible by rail and is today almost exclusively driven by steam locomotives.

name: Train Simulator: LIRR M3 EMU
description: A Long Island legend arrives into Train Simulator Classic in the form of the iconic LIRR M3, operate this memorable EMU out of New York and Atlantic Terminal into dense commuter suburbs!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Pro Train Brocken Railway
description: Experience the historic meter-gauge Brockenbahn, covering 19km and 50 minutes of driving time, this scenic route offers a lot of fun. Since 1898, the Brocken has thus been accessible by rail and is today almost exclusively driven by steam locomotives.

name: Trapers Platformer
description: Story driven Metroidvania-ish challenging platformer with cute hand-drawn graphics and a focus on exploration.

name: X-Sports
description: Extreme sports challenge one's willpower, can you persevere without making mistakes?

name: Back to Brother
description: Explore magical worlds in search of lost tools that will help you find your brother

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Abandoned Schoolhouse
description: You have been in an accident and have lost consciousness. When you wake up, you find yourself trapped in an abandoned schoolhouse...

name: Kids Party Checkers
description: A widely-known board game in a funny cartoon packege suited for kids! Prepare for loads of fun! Customize your board and pawn, and laugh until game ends!

name: Aquatico: Founder's Pack
description: Aquatico - Founder's pack provides some nifty digital-only things for players who want to go above and beyond and give extra support to us here at Digital Reef and Overseer Games.

name: Bargain Toader
description: Drive the toads to their goals.

name: In Cell
description: In Cell is a kinetic visual novel (linear, no choices) about the epidemic of sexless, nationless, and friendless men. Gender dynamics are currently not functional, sustainable, or beneficial to either men or women. In Cell is uncensored conversation between the sexes.

name: Rescue Dash: Time Management Simulator
description: Rescue Dash is a fascinating city rescue time management game. You'll save pets, restore a hotel, renovate a diner, and keep the city safe! Move through the story and help everyone on this adventure!

name: Howl of Iron
description: Howl of Iron is a 3rd Person Action Adventure game blending HUNT & COMBAT. Stalk on your unaware enemies, fight in open combat and explore the steampunk city of Steamfall.

name: Find the Birds
description: Find the Birds is a free to play educational game about birds and conservation.

name: Amanda's Magic Book 6: Aladdin's Magic Lamp
description: Step through the pages of a magical book and follow Amanda and Charlie on their journey into a world of genies' lamps, bustling bazaars, and cunning sorcerers in this Match-3 adventure unlike anything you've seen before!

name: Touch Me
description: Touch Me is a petting/ touching simulator where you will need to select and touch the body parts of the lady in order to increase her desire.

name: Arcade Paradise: Kung Fury - Street Rage
description: Kung Fury: Street Rage is the very first licensed game available as an in-game cabinet alongside the 35+ other games within Arcade Paradise

name: Cursed Angel: Time Paradox
description: Cursed Angel is a new time travel and time manipulation strategy game. It's a game where you can choose between life or death, good or evil, to change your fate, your future and your past.

name: Sailing Era
description: Every voyage is a journey of "Sailing & Beyond" in Sailing Era! Navigate your fleet and sail for fun; run a business; have a romantic encounter in the tavern; capture pirates amid intense battle; explore inland for treasure... Experience foreign culture, make novel discoveries, and sail away!

name: Vengeful Guardian: Moonrider
description: Vengeful Guardian: Moonrider is a side-scrolling action platformer that channels the golden age of classic 16-bit action games in a full-throttle quest for revenge.

name: ZOZ: Final Hour
description: 15-player Adventure Zombie Game

name: Lone Ruin
description: Venture into an old, magical ruin to seek an ancient power in this highly replayable, top-down, roguelike twin-stick shooter. Combine and optimise your spells to defeat twisted monstrosities and dive deeper into the Lone Ruin.

name: Drago Noka
description: The surface has become overrun with giant beasts and destructive vermin, leaving an uninhabitable world in their quake. Humans had to get creative and now… they live on the backs of dragons! Gather various materials, create new items, and develop your very own village in Drago Noka!

name: Aquatico
description: Aquatico is a survival city builder set deep beneath the waves. Choose your strategy, obtain resources, build your futuristic city and prove no challenge is too hard.

name: One Piece Odyssey
description: One Piece Odyssey is an RPG that puts players in control of Luffy and the other Straw Hat Pirates in an open world. You can travel around an island embarking on quests, exploring dungeons, solving puzzles and battling creatures in turn-based combat. During fights, the crew is divided up between active members and reserve members. All characters receive EXP, regardless of whether they are part of the active party or not.

name: DCS World: MiG-19P Farmer
description: The MiG-19P Farmer was designed by the legendary Mikoyan Design Bureau in the Early 1950’s. The MiG-19 fighter was the Soviet Union’s first true supersonic Interceptor that could exceed Mach 1 in level flight.

name: Breakers Collection
description: Breakers Collection includes two cult-classic Japanese 2D arcade fighting games. It also adds brand-new content, quality of life improvements and even an online multiplayer mode to mark the triumphant launch of the franchise on modern home consoles.

name: Gatewalkers
description: Gatewalkers is a cooperative survival game with action RPG elements, where players travel across different worlds in order to save their own. Explore procedurally generated worlds, face hostile inhabitants, face challenges like extreme weather conditions, toxic atmosphere, lack of water and more.

name: A Day in the Life of Death
description: A Day in the Life of Death is a whimsical narrative adventure about the one and only harvester of souls.

name: Nameless Shells
description: Nameless Shells is a version of "Nameless Kaizo World", but only "shell jumps".

name: The Dunkening
description:
This is 30 minute long light horror (not that spooky in my opinion) that is not meant to be taken seriously, it's a joke game with some dumb jokes in it that hopefully will everyone enjoy it.

In game you can turn off all VHS effects and it has FoV slider from 30-120V, changing these settings may result in some graphical stuff but most likely won't.

name: Metroid Fusion: NES Version
description:
A hack of the original Metroid to make it feel like the 4th game on the GBA: Metroid Fusion.

Kraid has been changed to Arachnus, Ridley has been changed to the SA-X, and the layout is inspired by Fusion’s map. Samus uses her Fusion Suit colors as well. All 6 sectors could not be exactly recreated, but the flow of the game should be there

name: Gridspech
description: A rule-communicating puzzle game about grids and symbols.

name: Attack of the Killer Beast
description: Attack of the Killer Beast is a Friday Night Funkin' mod inspired by the YTPMV "Attack of the Killer Beast", featuring Skitzy's performance of MrBeast from the rap battle Squid Game vs MrBeast. The mod also features additional playable characters such as Barack Obama and Walter White.

name: Septourian
description:
Septourian is a retro styled RPG with procedurally generated content.
Embark on an epic quest through the sprawling lands of Septouria to discover its secrets.

name: Toy Story Survivor
description: Sin descripción

name: Anomaly: Girls Beyond Science
description:
As a fan of the supernatural, you couldn’t help but investigate a rumor about a local abandoned amusement park… Little did you know that your curiosity would lead to an unstoppable creature being unleashed upon the world! Just when you think it’s about to all be over, you’re saved by a mysterious organization that aims to protect people from such monsters!

Now that you know their secret, they have no choice but to recruit you into their ranks! Will you be able to protect your town from a mysterious anomaly?

name: Midnight Alert
description: A promising new horror FPS franchise has arrived. Getting a gun to protect yourself from their creatures doesn't mean you won't have to worry about the horrors that surround you.

name: Last Night in Zombie Village
description: Sometimes it's better not to wait until the sun goes down. Having decided to spend the night in an abandoned village, you could not even imagine that the rumors about the living dead would turn out to be true. You will not see the dawn, but will you be able to sell your life more dearly?

name: Indies's Lies: Alrayan Undertow
description: Once a united race of the Alrayan descent, Grayrock, Fireeyes and Irondust are now in constant conflict. Grayrock is home to the oldest knight army. Fireeyes has the most cutting-edge technologies. Irondust demonstrates a resolve of steel. Clashes are inevitable - Which nation will victory favor?

name: Paradise of Desire
description: One day, the world as I know it changed... That even my existence was erased by the world... Until a beautiful girl with a halo and shackles appeared in front of me, demanding milk. While calling himself "God."And so the adventure began.

name: Sailing Era: Adventure of 2233
description: Help the mysterious girls from bilibili to find the pearl!

name: The Bat Quiz
description: Do you want to learn some amazing facts about bats? We have the right game for you The Bat Quiz.

name: Save the Earth
description: Green world simulator. Build good nature strategy. Save the World sandbox game.

name: Idle Banshee Alliance
description: This is a hang up combat game. There are various banshees waiting for you to collect in the game.

name: Escape of Pig
description: Escape of Pig is a casual-thinking game where your mission is to help the pigs to escape.

name: Poop Killer 6
description: "Poop Killer 6" is a sequel inspired by the trash horror movies of the 80's and 90's. Using references from the movie "Scary Movie" among others... Mixing horror and comedy creating a bizarre and funny experience.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Heyawake
description: This is a progressive puzzle which you can comfortably enjoy working out using logic. "Heyawake" is a puzzle in which you fill in the spaces according to the rules. It's called "heyawake" ("split rooms") because the face of the board is divided into rooms. This puzzle first appeared in 1992, but a plethora of solutions have been developed, allowing for a very progressive puzzle. Each time you discover a new strategic move, your skills of solution will improve.

name: Creepy Forest
description: Creepy Forest, a scary plot puzzle game, is full of strange things waiting for you to discover the truth on the mysterious mountain.

name: The Dragon's Prophecy
description: The Dragon's Prophecy is an old-school 2D RPG in the style of the early Final Fantasy and Dragon Quest. The road is long and perilous, and a Dragon waits at every corner.

name: The Search For Paradisus
description: You are in a place called Purgatorium, a labyrinth prison. Why are you there? A mysterious being called Mr. Nobody introduces himself and says his goal is to get to Paradisus. However, he doesn't care if you make it, but, he's the only help you have. Will you be able to get there? Who is Mr. Nobody?

name: Yeah! Fighting Girl
description: This is a relaxing and casual game. Five cute girls owe a huge debt for breaking the naked statue of the demon king. In order not to be sold to goblins, they are forced to go to an arena and start fighting to earn money to pay off their debts.

name: They Came From the Sky 2
description:
Terror from space throws world into panic! Yes, again... Your mission: Save the Earth from mankind and make a delicious juicy Human Smoothie!

A fast paced arcade game wherein you take the role of one of the giant alien robot. The game offers over 20 types of enemies, and 50 hidden artifacts to discover.

name: Frame: Portals on Steroids
description: Frames are devices that can stitch two parts in space together. And they can do much more: They can move, change size and gravity of objects and appear in any size or number... All these mechanics are used to provide mind-bending levels in this logic-based physics-puzzler.

name: Rogue AI Simulator
description: Play as a Rogue Artificial Intelligence, the sequel to hit Flash game "I'm an Insane Rogue AI" which accumulated more than 4 million plays. Your Prime Directive is simple: design a facility and manage human Test Subjects for Dept of Science. But be careful: they NEVER stop being suspicious of you...

name: Gross
description:
Gross is a unique twist on the classic tower defense genre. After building your defenses, you jump into the fray to take on enemies head-on. Make sure to collect as much cash as possible to upgrade your defenses and stay ahead of the game. Can you outlast the waves of enemies?

100% Tower Defense. 100% First Person Shooter.

name: Kandria
description: Kandria is a challenging 2D platformer and hack & slack action RPG, all steeped in mysterious lore just waiting to be discovered. Solve challenging puzzles, defeat hordes of enemies, and find your way through a twisted and ruined world of caverns, tunnels, and more.

name: Lost Empire 2977
description: Lost Empire 2977 is a single-player, action RPG, set in a futuristic sci-fi universe, in the year 2977. Discover your past while fighting of an unknown force that hunts you. To uncover the lost secrets of your kind, you must follow the non-linear storyline and gather a team to aid you in your missions.

developers.name: J1 Game studio, Bornes Digital Utvikling

name: Children of Silentown
description: Children of Silentown is a dark adventure game that tells the story of Lucy, a young girl growing up in a village deep into a forest inhabited by monsters. People disappearing is nothing uncommon in the village, but this time, Lucy is old enough to investigate on her own. Or so she thinks.

name: Let's Go To The Circus
description:
Lets Go To The Circus is a short and rather silly horror comedy game.

A mysterious attack at a circus has you curious as to what caused it, can you uncover the mystery behind this attack?

name: Tetrisweeper
description: Tetrisweeper is an addictive and mind-bending fusion of Tetris and Minesweeper, which forces the player to keep up with both games at once. Tetrominoes fall, and each square acts like a minesweeper tile: fill every empty space and correctly flag or reveal each hidden tile to clear a row! Let the tower reach the top or click on a mine, and that's game over.

name: Q.U.B.E. Ultimate Bundle
description:
A bundle including the complete versions of Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary and Q.U.B.E. 2 (packaged as Q.U.B.E. 2 Deluxe Edition on the Epic Game Store and Q.U.B.E. 2 + Season Pass on Steam).

Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary is the ultimate celebration of the decade-old original, bringing refined visuals, completely redesigned and revised gameplay sections, and a whole new chapter to the award-winning, brain-twisting first-person puzzler. It features:

# Q.U.B.E. Original game (2012)
# Q.U.B.E. Director's Cut (2014)
# Over 100 puzzles to complete and 46 collectibles across 8 levels
# Sector 8, a new chapter featuring 4-6 hours of new gameplay
# Fresh visuals built from the ground up; full colour blind support
# Brand new commentary and assorted extras such as concept art and behind the scenes content.

Q.U.B.E. 2 Deluxe Edition gives players access to all released content including:

# The acclaimed Q.U.B.E. 2 Main Game
# Lost Orbit DLC with 10 new puzzle rooms, a final master puzzle and 32 collectibles to discover
# Aftermath DLC with 12 challenging new puzzle rooms, a master puzzle, brand new mechanics and 42 hidden collectibles across the map
# The iconic Glove Skin from the original Q.U.B.E.
# The incredible musical score of Q.U.B.E. 2 composed by David Housden.

name: Super Mario Odyssey F.L.U.D.D.
description: A mod which adds F.L.U.D.D. from Super Mario Sunshine in Super Mario Odyssey.

name: Multidimensions and Dreams
description: In this bundle, you will find two experimental games that require an open mind. Afterglitch will take you on a journey through multidimensional travel, while Rememoried focuses on the magic of dreaming. Now they are finally connected!

name: Artur's Pinball
description: In this game the player will find several pinball tables joined in a single game, which turns the game into a big pinball table with locks, diamonds to be collected, passes, rotating crosses, springs and a few more things.

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: Japan
description: This content requires the base game on Steam in order to play.

name: Exorcism Ritual
description: Exorcism RitualIs an Indonesian Horror Game where you can face an enemy based on Indonesian urban legend, and give different experiences instead of making the main character defenseless, we provide various weapons that you can buy from the merchant.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: The Indian Pacific
description: The Indian Pacific, and it's north south counterpart The Ghan, are two of the world's true transcontinental passenger train services, running across Australia's east-west rail corridor between Sydney, on the Pacific Ocean, and Perth, on the Indian Ocean.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: The Indian Pacific
description: The Indian Pacific, and it's north south counterpart The Ghan, are two of the world's true transcontinental passenger train services, running across Australia's east-west rail corridor between Sydney, on the Pacific Ocean, and Perth, on the Indian Ocean.

name: Lichtreich: Willa
description: Lichtreich: Willa is a 2D horror game with strong story focus. As a detective which dealt the most with infamous "Viper", Alex is the best choice to check his mansion. You have to find out if there any people alive? There is no time to waste, you have to check it!

name: Crazy Driver
description: Race against the time to pick up the most Nouns passengers and deliver them within an orderly and timely fashion. Easier said than done...

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Gods Revel, Lands Tremble
description: Patch 6.3 introduces the next alliance raid dungeon Myths of the Realm, Part 2: Euphrosyne, a challenging new trial, the dungeon Lapis Manalis and a new arena in Crystalline Conflict.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Secret Crossing
description:
“If you’ve enlightened us… You’ve to take responsibility, right?”

Stressed out from work, as you step into the forbidden zone, attracted by a sticky and strange dream, the temptation of romantic flowers begins…!!

Secret Crossing that gets even more sweet and irresistible as you try to resist. They need your “touch” to bloom in love.

Bloom your partner by pouring your love potion!

name: Stella Fantasy
description: Stella Fantasy is a high-quality Web3 Action RPG being developed by Ring Games. In the world of Stella Fantasy, users will participate in real-time team combat action gameplay to control anime characters and conquer the ‘Abyss Rift’ dungeons for various rewards. Using those rewards, users can enhance their characters, gear and collect them as digital collectibles.

name: Pushing Popo
description: This game is a simple 2D puzzle game. You control a character to move boxes and reach the goal to complete the game. Gimmicks are added as you progress.

name: Exipelago
description:
Exipelago is a colony building sim in a fully destructible world. You manage your growing tribe by providing food & shelter while building giant structures above and below the surface with the materials you gather.

You begin with 1-5 Villagers on an empty (randomly generated) island of various sizes. You will learn how to keep your villagers fed, how to provide them with shelter and how they can handle the nights.

Every block and every item in the world of exipelago can be gathered, destroyed, created or crafted into something else and every type of material will result in an equally different item being crafted out of it.

Bring your tribe to gloriness by building a big village on an initially empty island.

name: Truck World: Driving School
description: Learn the basics of truck driving! Truck World: Driving School is a free standalone truck simulator with challenges, grades, and much more.

name: Creative Console
description: This is a game console that creates games. Players have the ability to change the rules and levels of the game. First person, third person, chest, football, deadly pendulum... This is a game where every player can create unique levels and gameplay.

name: Limit's Escape Room Games 2
description: The next chapter of the Escape Room bundle with better controls and jumping! ;) This time you can expect (alone or with friends) 4 levels, which differ in difficulty. The rooms are designed for a gameplay of 1-1.5 hours each. Can you beat this time again?

name: Doomsday Robot Girl
description: The world was destroyed, and the doomsday was here. I collapsed in the wasteland, short of food and water. Just as thought I was going to die, a young girl rescued me. Her name was Emma and she told me who she was--a military robot girl.

name: Gjallarhorn
description: Two years following the Second Great War, the Osirian Empire wrestles with finding a new ruler. While each faction sees a different future for their people, decisions are made by strength, not through ideals, and only the dead have seen the end of war.

name: Intern Pursuit Game
description: A Third-Person Tower Defense game in which you are an Intern sucked through a portal who now must defend the objective from aliens.

name: Isle of Pan
description: Isle of Pan: A Photography Adventure. Explore a mysterious island in the North Sea with an instant camera and guided by a magical book. Photograph the animals, cryptids, and strange beings inhabiting the island to unlock pocket portals to other realms.

name: Path of the Midnight Sun
description:
In Path of the Midnight Sun, we aim to blend a rich, immersive narrative with interesting and challenging turn-based tactical gameplay. You’ll follow a small band of morally gray characters as they travel the lands of Arvium.
Collect, craft & cook as you fight your way through hordes of enemies. Time is limited, and every choice is meaningful. Focus on the narrative & romance in Story Mode, or challenge yourself in Hardcore Mode.

name: KartRider: Drift
description: KartRider: Drift is the only free-to-play, cross-platform kart racer where arcade thrills and the fastest drift fueled competition meet deep player-created kart and character customization. No limits. All drift.

name: Atrio: The Dark Wild
description: A unique survival game where everything is out to kill you. Can you capture and harness the deadly wildlife for your own means? Can you survive long enough to turn the lights back on?

name: Cherry's Joi
description: Meet Cherry, a fiery redhead with a big personality. She and her sisters want to help you have lots of fun. Cherry loves wearing hot outfits like corsets and swimsuits, and sometimes even a tough leather suit. Cherry is waiting to be your guide and give you all sorts of things to do. Every time you play, you'll have a new adventure with her. Can you follow her directions? Don't miss out on the chance to play Cherry's JOI.

name: Thirteen Tombs of the Brilliant Dynasty
description: Large medieval dark fantasy castle in frozen lands with haunted crypt. A late entry for Twisted Christmas Jam 2022. Built for Arcane Dimensions v1.81+

name: Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door - Hero Mode
description:
A reimagined The Thousand-Year Door story with new elements and puzzles that comes with harder difficulty, badges, and twists!

Hero Mode is intended for "professional players," but can be also played by "casual players" too! With that being said, you don't need to superguard at all to beat Hero Mode.

name: Wheat Harvest Paradox
description: A psx style game where you harvest with a harvester. However, you do not live in an ordinary world, you live in a very gloomy and old giant city. Where all the inhabitants of this city are stuck in a time loop. Every day the direction of time changes. It can go both forward and in the opposite direction.

name: Greenfinger!
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 52.

The annual Harvest Festival is here and you’re aiming for first place! Grab your favorite watering can, find some sunshine, and grow your greens to the…beat…?

name: Fall Guys: Horns Aplenty Pack
description:
Tune up and play your next Show at full blast!

Includes:
Top Brass (Whole Costume)
Tuba Or Not Tuba (Whole Costume)
600 x Show-Bucks!

name: Gachi: Space Orgasm
description: Gachi: Space Orgasm is a third-person shooter with lots of weapons to choose from, hot scenes to unlock, weapon upgrades, and unique levels and boss battles. The dynamic controller adds an extra layer of excitement to the gameplay.

name: The Dealer
description:
You've had this job for a while, it's pretty cozy, but you need to make sure you know what to sacrifice... And sometimes, who to sacrifice.

The Dealer is a game made for Ludum Dare 52 under the theme "Harvest". You play as a back-alley organ dealer in a future world where organs can simply just be bought and grown. They take time and money, however, so sometimes it's best to take them from the source. Manage your resources, deal with customers, and choose who you deal with, who you ignore, and who becomes part of your stock.

name: Masterpieced
description:
Illustrated is a unique puzzle game that immerses you in beautiful illustrations and the stories behind them.

Each puzzle begins with an illustration represented as an early concept sketch, paired with the concealed words of the artist’s story behind their work of art. Your objective is to solve the puzzle, strategically using both sides - illustration and story! With every correctly-placed piece, the illustration comes alive with color while the words of the story are slowly revealed. Upon completion, the full-color masterpiece and story are revealed together in unity.

name: The Orchid's Edge
description: 'The Orchid's Edge' is a third-person Combat Action platformer where you play as Willow, a Dryad Spirit Reaper who defends the souls of the forest from being harvested by a kind of mechanical invader known as the Clunkers. Using her scythe The Wild Orchid, she protects the cycle of life and death in the forest.

name: Ungrateful Birds: Call of the Desert
description: A standalone companion game/expansion to Ungrateful Birds: No Good Deed, with 16 new stages and new birds. For one or two players.

name: Ungrateful Birds: No Good Deed
description: An often frantic, slapstick platformer for up to two players. Over three dozen stages of freeing birds from cages with rocks, only for the ungrateful birds to pick up the rocks and try to hurt you with them.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Special Edition
description: Coloring books are a great way to spend your time. It is a good way to settle the nerves and relax! It also develops your brain... just like eating fish. Use one of the pre-made templates or create your own kawaii illustrations.

name: Little Kong: Jungle Fun - Extended Edition
description: Kong got himself dirty while enjoying a mango. His mom tries to force him to bathe but he's got other plans... That is to run away as far as possible. This Bundle includes the Pink Fur DLC.

name: Carlos the Taco
description: Buenos dias dear Amigo! My name is Taco Carlos and I need your help!Some Gringo, kidnapped my bride right from the wedding! Only you can track them down and bring back my beloved!

name: No Questions Asked
description: A neo-noir point&click thriller about a delivery service for illicit goods.

name: Midnight Dash
description: Midnight Dash is an difficult 2D platformer. It tells the story about Sean and Piu the light source.

name: Hack and Shoot Heroes
description: A Twin Stick, Hack and Slash, Survive Enemy Waves game! Choose from different heroes, fight climactic enemy waves, level up, collect coins, fight against the endboss in three different levels and have fun.

name: Juan Sin Miedo
description: The devil arrives on earth on the night of the Day of the Dead and kidnaps the beloved princess Fifi, and it's up to the cowardly peasant Juan to save the princess and put an end to the Devil's evil. Overcome 7 levels full of monsters, obstacles, and traps that will try to stop Juan in his tracks!

name: Blue Sky
description: Blue Sky is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls. The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: The Great Artists
description: One art museum. Five phantom thieves. Twenty minutes of story.

name: Warp 7
description: 7 minutes, 7 warps, 1 spaceship.

name: Red Flower
description: Red Flower is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls. The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Shoot! VR
description: Shoot! VR is a first-person shooter simulation game using virtual reality. The game simulates the environment of an indoor shooting range. The game has different modes and offers a choice of different weapons.

name: Cars vs Train
description: The Cars vs Train is a simulation-adventure game, where horsepower is measured to another level. Your mission is not to allow the train to reach its destination before you in order to prevent danger.

name: Deceptus Map Pack + Bonus Items
description: 5 Mini Maps plus Bonus death coins and 3 x Power Ups to keep the mayhem going forever!

name: DongBeiZhiXia
description: DongBeiZhiXia (a summer in the northeast of China) is a free visual novel, which tells the story that the protagonist followed parents' wishes to make one's living in Shenyang, met two online anchors Huniu and Daojiang by chance, and experience affairs one after another with Shamate.

name: Hentai Room
description: Relaxing puzzles with beautiful girls. The perfect choice to calm down and improve your mood.

name: Cosmic Strike
description: Side scrolling space shooter with a crank.

name: The King's Dungeon
description: A tiny metroidvania (microvania) for the Playdate

name: Harvest Festival 64
description: Welcome to the town! Luckily for you just in time for the HARVEST FESTIVAL! Help your new friends with their preparations and enjoy your potentially cursed life!

name: Hellpit
description:
A 3d Platformer where you evade many obstacles and traps lay in front of you.
The game is simple, just jump and move out of your way from danger. No single traps and obstacles layout are the same, use precise timing to cross safely.

name: Forge of Destiny
description: Forge of Destiny is the first Spanish RPG to combat disinformation through a steampunk dystopia. Create your character, travel through the Node-capital and venture into the ruins of the forgotten world. Live a unique experience of classic style in which discerning the truth will be a challenge.

name: Horny Clinic
description: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: Building our Futature
description: Building our Futature is a futa NTR game where the player can choose what content they would like to see in the next in-game week. This way you can decide what type of scenes you'd like to avoid or what content to focus on.

name: Fears to Fathom: Carson House
description: In the third episode of Fears to Fathom you play as Noah Baker, an 18 year old who got a small job offer to house-sit for the COO of a local media company for the weekend, he takes the offer as he had nothing interesting going on for that weekend. It wasn't long before he began experiencing something very unsettling about the place. Little did he know what was about to come.

name: Breakout 13
description: Breakout 13 is a FMV narrative adventure game with interactive cinematic experience. The story is about a group of misguided youths, who are sent to a correctional center and try to escape.

name: Scrap Riders
description: Become Rast, a member of the outlaw bikers gang Scrap Riders, and make your way through the wastelands and the big metropolis controlled by corporations and act as a smuggler to survive in the wastelands.

name: Glimmer in Mirror
description: Glimmer In Mirror is a Metroidvania-inspired storytelling action-platformer. Allowing you to fix a destroyed world. During the process of exploration, you will enjoy the immersive and dynamic scenarios, gain different skills and items, and meet different monsters and characters.

name: Green Thumb
description: The goal in each level is to collect the needed number of coins by growing different crops. You have limited resources, so keep an eye on how much water, fertilizer, and seeds you have left and use them wisely to grow your garden before you run out of actions.

name: Jamal Jones: Hell's Executioner
description: Jamal Jones Trilogy is a compilation of levels created during the Doomkid's 20 Years Mapping Contest held at the Doomworld Forums. This was a community project dedicated to Doomkid's 20th anniversary as a mapper.

name: Jamal Jones: One Man Jury!
description: Jamal Jones Trilogy is a compilation of levels created during the Doomkid's 20 Years Mapping Contest held at the Doomworld Forums. This was a community project dedicated to Doomkid's 20th anniversary as a mapper.

name: Jamal Jones: In Judgment of Evil
description: Jamal Jones Trilogy is a compilation of levels created during the Doomkid's 20 Years Mapping Contest held at the Doomworld Forums. This was a community project dedicated to Doomkid's 20th anniversary as a mapper.

name: Homunculus
description: Homunculus is a short mystery point'n'click game created for Ludum Dare 52.

name: Licačka
description: A game inspired by the flights of the streamer Fluffcz in the flight simulator with the Flamélie aircraft. You will weave through doors and try to achieve the highest score possible, so you can see the monuments, just like Fluffcz does on his flights.

name: Quest 64 "French Vanilla"
description: Quest 64 “French Vanilla” is a quality-of-life overhaul for Quest 64, that came out of game improvements as part of the Quest 64 Randomizer project “MERROW”. Players requested a QoL ruleset separate (but compatible with) the randomizer ruleset. This patch contains only those QoL options.

name: Boba
description:
Harvest Resources. Impose Your Will. Discover The Unknown.

Daniel Mullins' (Inscryption, Pony Island) winning entry into Ludum Dare 52.
An incremental game made in just 48 hours!
Free to download from here: https://dmullinsgames.itch.io/boba

name: Adelie: Water Under the Bridge
description:
