Harvest fish daily to keep the baby penguins fed. Be careful, the fish won’t go without a fight!

Move toward a fish while adjacent to it to attack it. Mola Molas (the large fish) take two hits to capture, while everything else only needs one. Carefully plan your route in this turn-based dungeon crawler to out-maneuver the fish- how many fish can you harvest?

name: Only One Night
description:
Keep the fire burning and help your injured friend survive the night!

Search the area for firewood, but be careful not to freeze to death or be surprised by wild animals!

name: Spider-Cube
description: Play as a Spider-Cube and Jump on the Platforms!

name: Waste Eater
description:
After a global revolution dealt a final death blow to the world's crumbling industries, researchers and activists were left to pick up the pieces of their planet's ruined ecosystems. Their solution was simple: they turned themselves into pollution-eating mutants.

Now, over half a century later, the rivers are blue again and the birds have learned new songs. A beautiful world is stepping out of the husk of the old.

And the last waste-eater is waiting to die.

name: Cat Snack Bar
description: Cat Snack Bar is a Simulation game developed by Treeplla.

name: Adventures of Red and Carmine
description: The Adventures of Red & Carmine is a simple platformer game with soft background music and fun gameplay, with the special feature to play as Red and Carmine as they adventure through different worlds, and find their way back to each other and go back home.The demo version features Red only.

name: Eleonor's Nightmares
description: A fractured family, a lonely little girl, a mystery beyond the walls of dreams... Something is happening, and it doesn't seem to be good. Explore Molly Eleonor's nightmares, find the truth and, more importantly, do not die. Enjoy this new and scary adventure, you won't sleep again.

name: Hexrogue
description: "Hexrogue" is a turn-based strategy roguelike game where you need to survive on a hex board island that changes every time you play. Use limited Action Points to move, attack, and build your way through the island and defeat frequently spawned enemies leading up to a final boss.

name: World of Mystery
description: Jump into the World Of Mystery and become the best Supernatural Detective! Uncover all the mysteries of every monsters and spirits to unlock the secrets of this mysterious land.

name: After the Meteor Shower
description: A platform game that starts with a space trip... simple mechanics, many different enemies, with 40 stages and sub-phases - 68 passages approximately

name: Welcome to the World of Nik and Kit
description:
A game in the "Nik and Kit" series!
This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!

name: The Jumping Muffin: Turbo
description: Join Big M on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Ascape
description: An exploration game with ASCII art

name: More Enemies
description: Put on your ass-kicking socks and get ready to have them promptly blown off in this indie monster-killing-bad-guy-fleeing-vent-crawling-chair-wielding shooter!

name: E-Girl Next Door
description: You've just moved in next door to a beautiful girl who seems to have it all together. Little do you know, she's just getting started in the world of online adult content creation. Help her out on her journey and see what this exciting adventure has to offer.

name: Animperium
description: Animperium is a turn-based strategy tabletop game! Fight with other players for resources to expand your army and buildings to destroy the enemy's main base! Explore the underground to gather resources in the later game and surprise the enemy from below!

name: Iconic
description: A visual 2D icon-based environment, with puzzles, traps, and obstacles, and no written text. Try to beat every level in a single run with limited lives, or see how fast you can run in a random level sequence time attack mode.

name: Bless Global
description: Bless - is a huge world, which has been simmering struggle between the Empire and the Union of Giron. Different races, each with its own history and philosophy, are on opposite sides of the conflict. Choose whose ideology is closer to you, and fight for all that is best in the world.

name: Clock Tower Deluxe
description:
Clock Tower Deluxe is a hack of Clock Tower (1995) for the Super Famicom created by BobSchneeder45

List of changes and improvements:

—Features—
Mouse support
Lost bedroom, clown doll, zombie, extra cave event ported from the PlayStation version
Can run up and down the stairs (can also run to all hotspots)
Refined chase system (opt out by using the classic chase patch)
Hold UP or DOWN to speed up the credits
Faster health regeneration
Region error screen disabled

—Mouse—
Left button: walk/click things
Right button: stop/panic button
Press SELECT to change mouse speed (on real hardware). Changes cursor speed for the gamepad instead if no mouse connected.
Move the cursor down to access the inventory. Right clicking there will switch to the default cursor

name: Tit-E-Bar
description: It's a direct continuation to Koodbool, but way closer to the original Duke 3D base level format with a layout-centric theme, falling under the Old Limits and with a non-Euclidian progression inspired by Lunatic Fringe.

name: Kiwi In Arms
description:
The kiwi took the arms !

Use your arms to defeat that mighty eagle !

name: Scudhead
description: This episode comprises five Plutonia maps which were originally submitted to FDTWID, mostly dating back to 2017. They include some balancing and progression changes to better tie them together as a standalone set.

name: Gomoku
description: The game of Gomoku written for 8-bit computers using cc65

name: Umokay 64DS 8: The End is Near...
description: Sin descripción

name: Pongo17
description:
In Pongo17, players represent godesses Midori(Nature) and Kuroyuri(Chaos), and they must defend their core crystal from a bouncing ball representing the original information.
As they move their paddles left and right, they not only defend their crystals but also modify the original information of the ball.
Along the way, they can collect power-ups symbolizing the different forces at play in this eternal struggle.
These power-ups have varying effects and can tip the balance in favor of one side or the other.

name: Insomnia's Window
description: You're an overworked receptionist that's been having a tough time at work. As a result, your sleeping habits have suffered a bit and you're unable to do much sleeping at all. Who better to escort you to dreamland than your boyfriend? <3

name: Demonic Pack
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Gachi: Christmas Party
description: Welcome to "Gachi: Christmas Party " a visual novel filled with hilarious and heartwarming moments set against the backdrop of a festive holiday party. Will you find love under the mistletoe or will you end up alone with only your eggnog for company? The choice is yours!

name: Elevated Dread
description: Elevated Dread is a tense and atmospheric first person indie horror adventure where a kid attempts to put up flyers in a squalid apartment block.

name: Rafa's World
description: This new game is fun for the whole family

name: Twitch Place
description: /r place but with twitch integration

name: Bloons Bomb Gem 3 Match
description: In a certain mysterious corner, there are rich gems of all kinds. A group of alchemists lived in the elf tribe. Suddenly one day, elves from another clans broke into them, competing for their gems.

name: Quiz Thiz France
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Timestamps: Unconditional Love
description: An exciting adult Visual Novel with a unique intriguing story featuring Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Romance, Sex, Humour, Character Development and some fun references.

name: SlasherRPG
description: Slasher RPG is game with many features, combining fantasy farming, action and survival. You can hunt, build, raise animals and hack and slash.

name: Healthy Plane
description: Destroy the unhealthy foods! Avoid fat and sugar! Complete the levels, collect points and dominate the leaderboard!

name: Grandma
description: Join the battle to save earth from aliens and robots. Choose to play on the side of humans or aliens in battle.

name: Fisherman's House
description: You have been kidnapped, and you don't know why and where you are. All you know is that you have to escape from this place before the fisherman kills you. In this house, you will find some items and puzzles that will help you escape from this house. Will you survive or get killed by the fisherman?

name: Minion Masters: Furry Fury
description:
The Furry Fury DLC is a great +300% value bundle to unleash the fury of the Cold North on your enemies! including the legendary Fergus Flagon Fighter! It also gives you a headstart in the Season Pass.

Includes:
- Snow Wall Arena
- Ravager (Master)
- Gray Wolf Ravager Master Skin
- 3x Fergus Flagon Fighter (Legendary card)
- 5x Mountain Gale (Supreme card)
- 20x Adventure Party
- 40x Wild Stonebjorn
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 3x Season Pass Tiers

Embrace your inner beast with Ravager. Use Ravager and his friends BRUTUS and TERROR BRUTUS to make crushing attacks. Support Ravager’s attacks with sturdy Stoutheart to make unstoppable pushes. The pack also includes the custom arena Snow Wall which is the perfect setting to unleash the fury of the north!

name: Guinevere
description: Guinevere is the first and only book of the Guinevere series.

name: Trucy's Magical Catastrophe
description: Welcome one, welcome all to a fast-paced rapid tale about the aftermath of one of Trucy Wright's many illustrious Christmas Shows! With presents galore and a sparkle of magic in the air, there's always fun to be had, cheer to be spread... and horror, when gifts go wrong! Join Trucy and her handy no-name sidekick Apollo whose a legal aide or something boring on their adventure to prevent a magical catastrophe!

name: Ace Attorney: Athena Cykes - Wisdom at Law
description: Athena has a new apprentice, top of his class super prodigy Blaze Mavrik (his sprites are so cool guys), and together they unravel a HUGE mystery and defeat a insane serial killer called 'THE HAND OF DEATH' who threatens to destroy law and order and everyone's lifes in Japanafornia!!!

name: Episode XOXO
description: Episode XOXO is a collection of interactive romance stories where you choose your destiny.

name: Moundville Factory Lost Tape 89
description: Moundville Factory Lost Tape 89 is a realistic urban exploration VHS Found Footage horror with emphasis on atmosphere, unpredictability, realism and a non-linear design with multiple endings and outcomes.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Bernina Pass Scenario Pack 01
description: New challenges await on the picturesque Bernina Pass with new scenarios created by SGL.

name: Cursed Fables: Twisted Tower
description: Can you stop a soul-stealing monster from terrorizing the kingdom?

name: Communite
description: Communite is a wholesome, cozy, multiplayer city builder based on kindness and co-operation. Restore life, unlock new tiles, and work together to rescue adorable creatures to join your world and make it grow!

name: Dark Night with Floppa
description: Dark Night with Floppa is an emotional horror from the first person about searching for pictures in a dark forest. The gameplay is simple – You found yourself in the wilderness and now you need to explore this place to collect 8 pictures of cats that someone hid somewhere nearby. Find all the pictures before the Big Floppa finds you. There is no complicated pumping, complicated plot or expensive special effects in this game. Only your lonely character, the night forest, a spot of dim light from a flashlight and a Big Floppa.

name: Royale Battle: Warzone
description: Royale Battle: Warzone is a Near-Future Sci-Fi Battle Royale game set in the heart of the city. Play either solo, duos or squads and be the last to survive the Battle Royale

name: BDSM Love
description: BDSM Love - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: We're Party Together!
description: Easy to understand and simple casual game. Let's play 10 mini-games using WASD and arrow keys and run for a new record!

name: System Escape
description: Can you escape this difficult underground facility? Robots listen for your every move and cameras monitor sensitive areas. You'll find a utility device and laser gun, but being stealthy will be your best chance at staying alive! Made for VR, but supports non-VR play too.

name: Dawn of Griseo
description: A medium-length visual novel set in a fantasy world where magic exists. The encounter between a boy living in a rural farming village and a girl who is a dark wizard leads to the revelation of truths that were never meant to be revealed.

name: Crypt Architect
description: Crypt Architect is a Sandbox Multiplayer Dungeon crawler - each player gets to pick traps and floors, which they use to build their room. When they are done building, all rooms get attached to each other and a race to the finish starts.

name: Paranormal Files: Price of a Secret - Collector's Edition
description: Rumors of hauntings surround the Russells’ Winery and Hotel for decades, but it’s not until you arrive that the paranormal goes on the offensive! Something doesn’t want you investigating the secluded island, and it will do anything to keep its secrets buried. Crack the case before it’s too late?

name: Bargain Blocz
description: In bargain blocz you have to fill up the boards without loosing much time.

name: 1941: Operation Barbarossa
description: PC conversion of a turn-based hex-strategy board war game.

name: Wet Sand
description: Erotic visual novel about adventures of Fabian Brook and his crew in Savage Waters. Explore the world with unique creatures and choose a beloved woman.

name: Majin and Sacrificial Girl
description: A card battle game while exploring dungeons. There are 15 floors in total, and it is cleared after defeating the boss on the bottom floor. There are 17 types of cards. Move with arrow keys and play with mouse clicks.

name: Race in Desert
description: Race in the Desert is a racing game where your mission is to pass each mission which will not be easy at all, because you'll encounter quite difficult obstacles.

name: Return to Abyss
description: Return to Abyss is a mowing survival game with Rogue-Lite elements, upgrade your weapons and use your fighting skills to fight through over 10,000 monsters on screen until defeat the culprit who broght chaos!

name: Hentai EroElf
description: Hentai EroElf is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of elf and 24 unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Puzzle Gods
description:
Match and switch elements to level up, defeat Little Hades and rescue the gods in this mythic puzzler. The Land of Olympus needs you!
Little Hades has kidnapped the Puzzle Gods, and Little Zu is the only one who can save them. Join Little Zu in his quest to rescue his friends!

name: Dyztopia: Post-Human RPG
description: It's a game about quitting your job

name: Metroid Blue
description: Metroid Blue is a simple yet enjoyable vanilla hack of the original game, featuring a fully-redesigned map, new rooms, new palettes and improvements over the vanilla game.

name: Pancake Bar Tycoon: Premium Edition
description: This bundle includes base game and expansion pack #2 with 20 new levels.

name: Good Pizza, Great Pizza: Cyber Pizzeria Set
description: An extravagant, cyber pizzeria decoration set targeting the hearts of all gamers! Thank you for your support!

name: Illuminati
description: Join the conspiracy of global domination and dark satire in this classic from Steve Jackson Games. As one of the Illuminati, you are driven by power, money, mayhem and more. Grow stronger as you plot to destroy your rivals. How will you take over the world?

name: Stay Still
description: Stay Still is a first-person horror adventure based on Vietnamese culture. The gameplay is focused on storytelling, puzzles and avoiding dangerous threats & spirits hunting you. Solve various puzzles, watch your surroundings, and of course survive.

name: The Starving Tournament
description: The Starving Tournament will be a Multiplayer Survival Game, loosely based on the "The Hunger Games" movies. The open alpha version is already available for public access. Try our open alpha, report bugs or give us your ideas to make it the best game it can be.

name: Roof Jump Stunt Driver
description: Perform amazing tricks driving at high speed high above the ground! Show your car driving skills and astonish the spectators!

name: Caladria Chronicles Volume 2
description: After the Otori twins, Tsubasa and Shou, end up getting kidnapped by some Nephrine forces, that's when their plan is starting to surface. Things get even more intense as other Caladrians, like Nerisu's group and the princess of Tamarin, Tokino Miyanohara, get involved.

name: Mix-A-Max
description: Mix-A-Max is an action packed beat 'em up where our hero Max must use his wits and defective copies' interchangeable parts to thwart a rouge prototype version of himself who has turned a toy store into a plastic battleground!

name: Legacy of the Pact
description: Legacy Of The Pact is an action packed survival game with some RPG and Rogue Like elements. Dynamic weather and events will keep you enthralled on your epic journey to defeating the evil overlord and maintain your legacy in a ruthless world. Access to various abilities will aid you on your journey.

name: September 7th
description:
Do you believe in the existence of Christmas elves that appear on New Year's Eve and Christmas? If so, then most likely you have heard of the good elves. But imagine that there are still evil elves. They create madness and can come to you at any time if they get bored. They are watching you and testing you. Or maybe they just want to have fun. Will you play by their rules?

Dima is a graduate student. His family is planning a move. Finally, this day came on the seventh of September, Dima and his parents move into a new apartment. A few weeks pass and Dima receives a funny Christmas Elf doll as a gift. With her appearance, strange things begin to happen in the house.

name: Formula 1 Game & Watch Playdate version
description: A Small Fictive Formula 1 Game & Watch style game with high score keeping.

name: Cat Life
description: Cat Life is an adventure and survival solo game, allowing you to explore a vast open world as a cat. A series of quests will lead you to solve the mysteries of this island, if you manage to face all its dangers!

name: Evacuation
description: Evacuation is an unofficial story-driven add-on for Half-life 2, telling the story of an rebel who crashes on a helicopter in the woods. Having miraculously survived, the hero picks up a walkie-talkie and decides to escape from the forest, which was attacked by the Combine.

name: Five Nights at Konto's
description: Fnaf inspired fan game for the Streamer kontoletzplay made in RPG Maker2003 by Florx

name: Stay Still
description: Stay Still is a first-person horror adventure based on Vietnamese culture. The gameplay is focused on storytelling, puzzles and avoiding dangerous threats & spirits hunting you. Solve various puzzles, watch your surroundings, and of course survive

name: Garten of Banban
description: Enter Banban's Kindergarten, and you're sure to make some friends. Explore the mysterious establishment and don't lose your life and sanity. Uncover the horrifying truth behind the place, but be careful, as you are far from alone…

name: Coralina
description: An investigation through space and time in a retro RPG that blends different art styles.

name: Fluffy Horde + Clumsy Rush
description: The Fluffy Horde is coming! Save your crops from the enemy and try to withstand the rabbit Tsunami. Clumsy Rush is a guaranteed dose of a laugh for friends and family. Why pick one when you can have them both.

name: Space Raiders in Space + Clumsy Rush
description: An alien hivemind sets out to destroy humanity. Protect your crew from giant bug creatures and assist them on their mission. Discover the truth about the alien invasion.. Clumsy Rush is a guaranteed dose of a laugh for friends and family.

name: Milton the Alien Guy
description:
Milton The Alien Guy is an adventure game set in a flying saucer where aliens have abducted Milton to study his strange eating habits.
Explore the saucer, cook some god-awful food, and escape the endless void of space!

name: Towering
description: Towering is a platform game that is inspired by Red Light, Green Light. When the background is red you are frozen in place. When the background is green you can move but most platforms and objects become invisible. The challenge is to study the placement of objects during red and navigate the tower during green by relying on your memory. Watch out for dangerous obstacles and enemies which will cause you to fall down! Can you reach the treasure at the top of the tower?

name: Vampire Tourist
description:
Vampire Tourist is a new type of immersive experience taking place in Central Europe.
You are a "Vampire in Vacation" that finds himself without powers while in this new land so when the opportunity arises to get them back things get complicated.
Experience the European streets and atmosphere during the night (as well as day) and capture the best shots while finding our more about the city, it's mysteries and maybe about yourself.

name: The Jumping Muffin
description: Join BIG M on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Polaroid
description:
Polaroid is a first-person horror game where a simple job turns into a horrific nightmare.

Tasked with printing out pictures (taken with a Polaroid camera!) and placing them into a container, you must perform the same act around about 120 times... whilst being paranoid about the nightmarish creatures that await you outside your office. The lights occasionally turn off, and you must venture out of your comfort zone to restore it via a lever right outside.

name: Trouble in Tornado Town
description: Trouble in Tornado Town is a physics-based destruction game with a cartoony twist! Become a force of nature and become the toughest tornado this town’s ever seen!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Paintings 2
description: Puzzles of famous paintings!

name: Fluff
description: A game where you collect fluff balls that are loose and fill them into jars, all while being accompanied by a feline companion.

name: Moto Rush GT: Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Prepare Uranus: Exploring Black Holes for Adults
description: Prepare Uranus is NSFW Visual Novel, where you're taking control of a bar on the planet Uranus, in which beautiful girls work. You have to improve the economy of your bar, pay off debts to space pirates, unravel the mystery of Black Holes and make Uranus the most popular place in the galaxy!

name: Seven Wonders
description: Seven Wonders is an ancient city-building game. It brings you back to ancient times, where you have to build the seven wonders of the ancient world. You have to manage resources and labor to build the wonders.

name: Planet TD
description: 6 different types of towers! 4 planets with different characteristics! 25 different enemies. Drones, Tanks, Biorobotic enemies and many different ground and air vehicles! Snowy and Glacial maps, Desert and Arid lands! Prepare to defend the solar system against invaders!

name: Alien Maze
description: Alien maze is a puzzle maze exploration game. Players need to use their brains to reach the exit in a limited number of steps.

name: Love n War: Hero by Chance II
description: Love n War: Hero by Chance II is a tactical RPG. The fight against the Drogakan empire goes on. Build your economy, recruit heroes and upgrade units.

name: Chaos Galaxy 2
description: A turn-based Galaxy totalwar game. Choose one of 12 factions, direct dozens of admirals, control hundreds of warships, mecha and monsters, set up various buildings, study technology, and lead fleets to carry out grand strategic actions on the map of the galaxy.

name: Luck be a Landlord
description: Luck be a Landlord is a roguelike deckbuilder about using a slot machine to earn rent money and defeat capitalism. This game does not contain any real-world currency gambling or microtransactions.

name: Battle Ram
description: "Battle Ram" is a fun arcade game about a Battle Ram who fights against robots.

name: Harpy's Curse
description:
A fearsome harpy exiled to a deadly labyrinth, you must find and defeat four guardians before confronting the Great Sphinx to escape. Fly through corridors of rock, brick and bone that hide strange secrets. Explore and evade dire traps and denizens, while finding powers and treasure to prepare you for your final showdown.

Harpy's Curse is a homebrew Metroidvania developed by Todd Furmanski and published by Atari Age.

name: 1 Fast Fight
description: 1 Fast Fight or 1ff.wad is 12 speedmaps in boom format/cl9 with a time limit of 1 hour each. The maps are generally small and fast paced with a twist. All enemies have their healthy vastly decreased, but have their movement speed vastly increased to compensate, the idea was the make everything "go by faster".

name: 7:45, Densha Nite.
description:
A rural train station during the day, where there are people scattered all over the place.
At this time of day, most students were supposed to be at school, but the boy was there.
A boy, wearing a school uniform, looks down at the train tracks from the platform.
The protagonist, who was drunk, called out to the boy.

A short visual novel about the strange friendship between an office worker and a middle school student.

name: King of Light
description: Sin descripción

name: Queen's Brothel
description: Sin descripción

name: 2032: A New Threat
description: 2032 is an Indie game with unique features. By 2032, 50% of global vegetation had already been completely consumed by a pest called P-X. A world war arises for basic resources for survival. Spider, a renowned soldier of the armed forces is summoned.

name: Pog XL
description: Cute, minimal physical puzzle.

name: Exorcist 2: Crow Magic
description: Are you ready to witness the adventure of the Exorcist, a master of magic and exorcism, and exorcise the most powerful dark being, the crow demon?

name: A Slime and a Civil War
description: Go through a world where every living being is a slime and take down the slime dictator in this 2D side-scrolling action game. Discover the secrets of a world no more on your journey.

name: Mudoba
description: "Mudoba" is an atmospheric survival horror with one procedurally generated location in the middle of a bog in a collateral dimension. Explore it. Look for clues. And find a way out of it.

name: Unexpected Futa Corruption
description: Unexpected Futa Corruption is a game about how a beautiful and pure angel girl finds herself in bed with her unexpected futanari date. She turns into a horny slutty futa-slut as they explore their fantasies together and with other futa girls from the neighborhood.

name: Sacred Earth: Alternative
description: As a lone girl who has awoken after a long slumber, travel through a broken world to remember just what happened, and where all of your friends have gone in this short, post-apocalyptic fantasy Visual Novel/JRPG with tabletop inspired elements.

name: The Cullfield Ritual
description: Take part in a dangerous ritual game that requires you to travel between reality and the "Spiritual Realm"

name: Otherworld Legends: Aigneis
description: Meet Aigneis: A Selenian princess and an adept astromancer. Aigneis inherits both her father's valiance and her mother's magical affinity, trouncing foes who would trifle with her using her shapeshifting scepter, Mondnacht.

name: The Voices Games Extra Collection
description: A collection of 4 short games from The Voices Games: a 3rd person horror shooter, 2d platformer, flight simulator in a tunnel and a second person escape

name: Ghost Killers: The Revenge of the Sucker-Fun
description: You will not just play... You'll live It...Inspired by the series and the movie mixing Horror and Comedy, Blood and Jockes, with different scenarios and environments.Try to survive the hunt of a spirit that wants to possess you anyway

name: Lobby Cam by Bryn Oh
description: An immersive short story walking simulator. Find diary pages to uncover the narrative behind a man who discovers a new channel on his TV. A melancholy story about the grey etiquette of technology.

name: In the Building: Cats 3
description: is a game in which you have to find all the cute cats. Cats will hide in all houses. Search every corner of the room, move the pillows, open the nightstands, check the toilet... Cats can hide in the most unpredictable places.

name: One Night At Barneys 3
description: A survival horror game based off of Five Nights at Freddy's featuring many iconic characters from Barney & Friends. Defend, upgrade, and discover secrets throughout the one night you will spend trapped in a prison.

name: SnowRunner: 2-Year Anniversary Edition
description:
SnowRunner’s 2-Year Anniversary Edition includes the base game as well as the Year 1 and Year 2 Passes.

Get ready for the ultimate off-road experience!

SnowRunner puts you in the driver’s seat of powerful vehicles as you conquer extreme open environments with the most advanced terrain simulation ever. Drive over 60 vehicles from brands such as Ford, Chevrolet, and Freightliner as you leave your mark on an untamed open world.

name: The Snow is Red
description:
You just finished from your smoke break and ready to go back to your works.. And suddenly someone knocking on your apartment door.

You feels like this is a thousands time you met her. But, you can't tell why. Enjoy the cozy conversations with aroma of coffee and friendship between two souls in a weird little town where 'The Snow is Red'

name: Think Logic! Sudoku: Binary - Suguru
description: Put your brain to the ultimate test with three of the most played number puzzles!

name: Bazzle
description: Bazzle combines sliding puzzles with Rubik's cubes and offers you puzzles of different difficulties, with a variety of challenges and tasks that are fun and will keep your brain busy. Develop strategies to solve the puzzles efficiently.

name: Slots Royale: 777 Casino Games
description: Bet money, spin the slot machine, and win exclusive prizes!

name: Hollow World: Dark Knight
description: Use various hand-to-hand combat skills to defeat hordes of mystical enemies and save the world!

name: Puzzle Vacations: Ireland
description: Discover the amazing Ireland through colourful puzzle adventure!

name: I'll be your ideal lover! My Dream Lover
description: A love battle where the ideals of the protagonist & the heroines clash!

name: Waternet
description: Playdate version of Waternet, which is a multiplatform water pipe puzzle game written for old consoles and handhelds.

name: Gods of Gravity
description: Gods of Gravity is a social, arcade-style RTS game where you compete in an epic showdown of celestial gods. Scoop up ships and fling them to capture a nearby planet, or open wormholes to teleport them across the solar system. Hold planets and moons to boost your production. Mine asteroids for the powerful resources within. And if you dare, capture the sun for the ultimate buff. Then send a massive fleet to conquer your enemy’s home planet. Last god standing wins.

name: A Rum Tale
description: In this platform game you will embody a drunken pirate in search of a lost cargo of rum. But will you be able to face the challenges that will arise before you?

name: Arcade Archives: Galaga
description: Face down the ultimate alien invaders!

name: Road to Scrubville: A Bijuu Mike Fangame
description: Road to Scrubville is a Bijuu Mike inspired fangame. Clarence decides to take revenge on Bijuu Mike once again, will it end well this time?

name: Agent Roy: Secure the Temple
description: Agent Roy: Secure the temple is a thrilling 3rd person action shooter. Roy is fighting a battle he cannot hope to win. 5 minutes. Deadly mercenaries. Can he hold the fort until the backup arrives? Prepare for the worst.

name: World War Battle Heroes Field Armies Call of Prison Duty Simulator
description: A game in which you can get acquainted with the hardships faced by soldiers in the world war.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Pearl vs Grey
description: Story Pearl and Gray find a treasure map. The two rivals compete with each other... Take control of Gray and clear 100 stages to reach the treasure first! Game System An easy-to-learn puzzle action game with lots of variety!

name: Horny Spell
description: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: Neon Noir
description: Neon Noir is an episode-based cyberpunk visual novel with interactive mechanics. It is set in the megalopolis of New Devon in the year 2169, where large private corporations have more power than the government. The player follows the crimes investigated by Colden, a Snatcher.

name: Super Vadimka VI: A Terrible Threat there is No Vadimka
description: Super Vadimka VI: A Terrible Threat There is No Vadimka is an action platformer with survival horror elements, created by VadimBallzGames released on January 5, 2023, for Windows. In this sixth installment of the Super Vadimka series, players follow the exploits of Vadim Kulev, an infamous figure from Velizh who has gained legendary status. The game boasts a retro 16-bit aesthetic reminiscent of SNES classics, featuring around 100 levels filled with challenging, bloodthirsty bosses that embody the disturbing Kulechkophobia virus that plagues the protagonist.

name: Under the Sky World
description: One day, by chance, I entered the most popular game "Under the Sky World"! When I entered, I accidentally found that the game was invaded by a virus. Players need to find evil hackers and stop this virtual world from being destroyed!

name: The Fernweh Saga: Book One
description: Expose the dark secrets and mysteries of your seemingly idyllic hometown in this romantic thriller! Will you fall in love or fall victim to its horrors?

name: Voice of the Wizard by Brett Farkas
description: Voice of the Wizard is a 100% voice recognition controlled adventure game. Explore an open world of forests, fields, and shorelines. Learn spells, solve mysteries, and defeat enemies. It's up to you to be the Voice of the Wizard.

name: Brichi Quest
description: Brichi Quest - adventure roguelite. Gameplay is a mix of Dont Starve and Zelda in lowpoly style. Explore randomly generated islands and dungeons in search of special items. Build your character set and fight the final boss.

name: OutWave
description: Endless car chase is a fast retro style paced game in which you must collect money and avoid the cops! The game supports Windows, Mac, Linux. Use keyboard or gamepad. Buy and control a cars or motorbikes. Listen to retro music and don't get caught by the cops! The game looks like a gif!

name: Hero Team
description: A side-scrolling multiplayer shooter. 1-4 local players can fight 4v4 battles online and offline, or speedrun practice missions.

name: Asunder
description: Asunder is a Hack & Slash Action RPG which allows you to switch between your party members at will.

name: K-Jo Chases the Cheese
description: The slight mouse K-Jo, accustomed to the tranquility of the countryside, found himself in trouble when trying to fight for food in the city. He needs your help to escape the mousetraps, collect cheeses, score points and leave each room before time runs out, and so go through the 120 existing levels.

name: Escape PS3 Hagrid
description: A Slender-style parody game featuring Harry Potter characters.

name: Towers
description: Nine speedmaps made in less than three days, all themed around towers and verticality. Built on Speed Mapping Progs v2021.11 (already included). Organized by zigi.

name: Junkfood
description: Junk Food is a Boom compatible Speedmapping Community Project held in Meowgi's Community Discord Server. The basic premise was to make "Junk Food" slaughter ala BFG spammy, high monster count maps where not a lot of time is spent deliberating about layout/detailing/fight design/other things that can bog a mapper down. It's just good BFG fun.

name: Her Love Just Washed Away
description: Love is so confusing.

name: Grasping
description: Mortalis Institute's patented Helper Bond System provides quick and easy diagnosis for physical trauma. Place your arm in the device and follow the simple instructions to receive a diagnosis.

name: Sea Town
description: You are locked in the Sea Town subway and you have to protect yourself from the possessed mannequins until 6 am.

name: Tearing Spaces
description: Tearing Spaces is a competitive NFT game where players battle it out to earn tokens and rewards. Players battle in teams of 3v3 against real players from around the world.

name: Dungeon Walk: Ryuumeikyuu no Kanrisha
description: Sin descripción

name: My Land!
description: My Land! is a strategy game where you mission is to expand your land and in same time to defend it.

name: Archer Defenders
description: Sin descripción

name: WarLeague
description: We combined a self-moving chess game with an RTS game to create a multiplayer strategy game with legion battles. Match and combine the cards of your choice, build your army from nothing to the cool feeling of thousands of troops, then crush your opponent, and finally eat chicken to win.

name: The Cricket C
description: Hit the ball to become the best cricket player in the world.

name: Cursed
description: Cursed is a scary atmospheric walking simulator game where you'll need to watch your back and solve a mystery

name: Dark Duel
description: A collectible card game that combines chess with cards. Extremely strategic with dark fantasy themes.

name: Undertale: Promised.
description: Undertale Promised. A fight against Sans but pretty early on in the story.

name: A Mallard's Song
description:
The game’s main mechanic makes use of a timer. This allows the player 60 seconds to find the level exit. If the player fails this task, the landscape becomes consumed with glitching visuals and strange folkloric characters, telling stories of England’s dark underbelly.

The game questions the English nationalistic love affair with politicized traditionalism and the toxic side effects this has had on individuals and marginalized groups.

Through storytelling and allegorical visual narratives, I wanted to explore my difficult past experiences of English nationalism and identity and the history and legacy of English environments and folklore.

name: The Diseases, and Casualties this year being 1632
description: We've got 11 Boom-compatible maps here made by SA goons all based on the image "The Diseases, and Casualties this year being 1632". Each mapper took causes of death and disease from the list below and made levels based on their interpretation of the cause.

name: Propaganda Inc.
description: Build an ultimate propaganda empire and use your influence to become a president of your country... no, the ruler of Earth... or even better, the overlord of the Galaxy! Propaganda Inc. is a satirical idle game, allowing the player to create their own propaganda machine.

name: ChronoCodex
description: Conquer the trials through platforming and dodging hazardous zones to ascend to the top.

name: Summer Village
description: A platform game in a charming medieval setting. Control a hero who jumps to overcome obstacles. Evolve your hero by looking for armor, shields and swords that make him stronger. As an extra challenge, try to find the hidden artifacts scattered throughout the world.

name: Hole in Won
description: Create the golf course by laying down tiles in the correct order. Play 100 handcrafted levels, create your own, or check out others in the Arcade.

name: Pip D
description: Pip D - cute puzzle game with pipes. Enjoy a relaxing time connecting pipes.

name: Out of Three
description: Out of Three is a local multiplayer Boss Rush game that can be played with 3 players. The goal: defeat the Boss Gorgone by cooperating with your team members. You and your 2 faithful comrades find yourselves in an unknown dungeon, face to face with a giant medusa. Your fate seems inevitable!

name: Aniwar
description: Aniwar is a universe inspired by adorable creatures where everyone may earn tokens via skilled gameplay and ecological contributions. Players can battle, collect, raise, create, and improve their own Ani. It is a platform for everyone to develop a sustainable community that contributes to the ecosystem.

name: Merge Monsters
description: Merge, Power up, Fight and Challenge yourself! Are you ready to join adventure of dungeon raid.

name: Sapu
description: Sapu is a young frog who lives in the frog village located in the frog forest. On a beautiful Tuesday afternoon Sapu is awakened by other villagers, informing him that his grandfather had been bitten by a poisonous carnivorous plant while catching fireflies for dinner, and that he was on the brink of death. Sapu despairs but soon has an idea of how to save his grandfather and goes on an adventure in the forest.

name: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia: Special Edition
description: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia is ideal for born explorers. Wandering around the lively boards, you’ll find animals and plants by yourself. Using a magnifying glass, you can reveal cards that contain interesting information and drawings.

name: Karakuri Kengeki
description: Karakuri Kengeki is a VR sword-fighting game in which the player fights as a samurai robot using a Japanese katana, moving through various stages redolent of old Japan.

name: You are the Weapon
description: Welcome to 'You are the Weapon!' In this game you are the weapon, enabled with powers that you unleash on your foes! The game is in development and graphics will be updated and improved!

name: Baba Files Taxes
description: Baba needs help filing taxes, and the deadline is tonight! Help Baba in order to make it in time.

name: Dodgeball Championship League
description: A physics based dodgeball league game with 32 unique teams.

name: Shmups Pack 2x1
description: Two spaceship games for fans of the genre.

name: Mario Kart Midnight
description: Mario Kart Midnight is a custom track distribution created by marionose1 and ZPL. It aims to be a celebration of custom tracks, featuring the "best" tracks released between December 2021 and November 2022. Every track released during this time period was featured in monthly public polls, which were voted on by custom track enthusiasts. Every track that averaged a score of four or above out of five was guaranteed a spot in the distribution. In order to reach the total of 200 tracks, certain trcks that averaged 3.5 out of five were also included.

name: Monster Knockout
description: An ever present threat has emerged from the darkness, it is up to you to travel through monster filled galaxies and defeat every single foe in your path. Choose from a range of super upgradeable bird nodes that allow you to unleash multiple attacks on any enemy

name: Hohenheim: Skywards
description: Welcome to Hohenheim: Skywards Fly high into the skyes and hope not to fall to the below as the Underbelly is ready to swollow you whole. A 3rd-person Plattformer with environmental puzzle and Randomly generated Maps.

name: Scientifically Accurate Dinosaur Mating Simulator 2022: American Revolution 1775 - 1786
description: Fake history. Real dinosaurs. Race across the birth of America, fight in historically inaccurate battles, and win the war for all humankind.

name: BackRooms New
description: This game is "BackRoomsNew" in game, after each level the game will be harder and in each level there will be all kinds of monsters that will try to catch you. Each level will have a task where you have to find a key or a lever and all sorts of things to open the door.

name: Dead Profit
description: A war rages between hell and what's above, your job is to supply magical weapons to the war effort. Orders come in and you must Mine, Craft and Enchant the weapons in time. Your production can be ENDLESSLY upgraded and optimized, paired with randomly generated orders to fill!

name: Project Speed 2
description: Project Speed 2 is a 3D Racing Game with multiple maps and vehicles to choose from made with the Unreal Engine.

name: Brawl Stars: Candyland
description: Sin descripción

name: Comic Coloring Book Complete Edition: Colors Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: AAA Clock 2: Ultimate Edition
description: Enjoy this extravagant timepiece along with the new Vulca Clock skin.

name: Botan's Bird Beats
description: Botan's Bird Beats is a fanmade game based on Shishiro Botan. The game has you play as Shishiro Botan and you shoot birds in beat to the songs playing.

name: Hoping This Finds You Well
description: A visual novel with a cute mechanic: Slide the letters back and forth across the screen, to experience the time the letter is written, and when it is read. Follows the interactions between two people in a game intended to emulate Victorian and Edwardian letters.

name: Fall Guys: Stunning Sealife Pack
description:
Make waves in your next Show with these deep sea delights!

Includes:
Pinchy McNab (Whole Costume)
U Jelly (Whole Costume)
Pumped Up Puffer (Whole Costume)
2000 x Show-Bucks!
